Lyrics: havaa tuu unase jaa kar kah de ik diivaanaa aayaa hai terii suurat pe marane vaalaa ik paravaanaa aayaa hai  jab se matavaalii aankhon se aankhen huii hain chaar tumako dekhe binaa na tab se milataa hamen qaraar yahii afasaanaa laayaa hai teraa diivaanaa aayaa hai  hamako tumase tumako hamase dil ko dil se kaam dilavaalon ke lab pe rahataa hai dilabar kaa naam ajab mastaanaa aayaa hai teraa diivaanaa aayaa hai  mil jaae diidaar mujhe main ho jaauun qurabaan ek jhalak dikhalaa do raanii de duun apanii jaan yahii nazaraanaa laayaa hai teraa diivaanaa aayaa hai

Title: do zulmii nainaan maar gae
Lyrics: do zulmii nainaan maar gae vo jiit gae ham haar gae main kaa karuun kuchh vo daren duniyaa se kuchh main daruun  zakamii dil le kar jaauun kahaan koii bole yaa hamen banaa le apanaa yaa meraa ho le jug jug vo jiien jag men aur main maruun kuchh vo daren duniyaa se kuchh main daruun do zulmii nainaan maar gae vo jiit gae ham haar gae main kaa karuun  ik rog niraalaa ham ne paalaa kayaa karuun bataa de koii sunne waalaa ro ro pukaare dil nainon ne maaraa sukh men katen din mere hai koii payaaraa jug jug vo jiien jag men aur main maruun kuchh vo daren duniyaa se kuchh main daruun do zulmii nainaan maar gae vo jiit gae ham haar gae main kaa karuun

Lyrics: ka duniyaa hamaare pyaar kii yuun hii javaan rahe  la main bhii vahiin rahuun meraa saajan jahaan rahe2   la do din kii zindagii hai ise yuun guzaar de 2     ujadii huii ye pyaar kii raahen sanvaar de 2     ham tum yahaan rahe naa rahe is kaa gam nahiin     lekin hamaare pyaar kaa baakii nishaan rahe     main bhii vahiin rahuun meraa saajan jahaan rahe ka duniyaa hamaare pyaar kii yuunhii javaan rahe la main bhii vahii rahuun meraa saajan jahaan rahe   ka duniyaa men chhod jaayenge ham vo nishaaniyaan 2     ban jaayengii jo pyaar kii miithii kahaaniyaan 2 do duniyaa hamaare baad hamen yuun karegii yaad     do pyaar karane vaale hain par ek jaan rahe     main bhii vahiin rahuun meraa saajan jahaan rahe     duniyaa hamaare pyaar kii yuunhii javaan  rahe     main bhii vahiin rahuun meraa saajan jahaan rahe     duniyaa hamaare pyaar kii

Lyrics: aaj koii hai aanewaala 2 ho aanewaala kaun ye kyuun batalaauun ho ho ye kyuun batalaauun 2 aaj koii hai aanewaala  jiiwan gaa re dil ye pukaare piyaapiyaa ho piyaapiyaa piyaapiyaa ho piyaapiyaa jiiwan gaa re dil ye pukaare piyaapiyaa ho piyaapiyaa  sudhbudh haare laaj ke maare moraa jiyaa ho moraa jiyaa  2 ho kaagaa bole kaagaa bole mere dwaar main dekhdekh muskaauun ho  aaj koii hai aanewaala ho aanewaala kaun ye kyuun batalaauun ho ho ye kyuun batalaauun 2 aaj koii hai aanewaala   o aaj kisii kii aas lagii hai machal rahaa hai kushii se dil machal rahaa hai kushii se dil  2  man meraa dole aur ye bole piyaa se mil ho piyaa se mil  2 ho duniyaa naache duniyaa naache sangsang main jhuumjhuum ke gaauun ho  aaj koii hai aanewaala ho aanewaala kaun ye kyuun batalaauun ho ho ye kyuun batalaauun 2 aaj koii hai aanewaala

Lyrics: bahaaron ne jise chhedaa hai vo saajejavaanii hai zamaanaa sun rahaa hai jisako vo merii kahaanii hai bahaaron ne jise chhedaa threedots  qasam khaa kar kisii ko jab apanaa banaauungaa chaman kii daaliyon se laaliyaan phuulon kii laauungaa sitaaron ke chiraagon se phir is ghar ko sajaauungaa ki is duniyaa men mujhako ik naii duniyaa basaanii hai bahaaron ne jise chhedaa threedots  chaman men sabane hii gaayaa taraanaa zindagaanii kaa magar sabase alag thaa rang merii hii kahaanii kaa fasaanaa is qadar rangiin thaa merii javaanii kaa ki jisane bhii sunaa kahane lagaa merii kahaanii hai bahaaron ne jise chhedaa threedots  koii samajhe naa samajhe main kahe detaa huun duniyaa se ki main duniyaa men huun matalab nahiin rakhataa huun duniyaa se kabhii kuchh dil men aataa hai to kah detaa huun duniyaa se merii aavaaz hii merii tamannaa kii nishaanii hai bahaaron ne jise chhedaa threedots

Title: kushiyaan manaaen kyon naa ham
Singer: shamshad mohantara lata chorus chitalkar rafi g m sajan chorus
Lyrics: prem latastanza 1 rajkumaristanza 2 shamshad stanza 3  kushiyaan manaaen kyon na ham ham kisii se kyon daren qisamat hamaare saath hai jalane vaale jalaa karen ho daddaan daddaan daddaan daddaan daddaan daddaan daddaa ddaan  mard hain to is liye ki kidmat karen vo aurton kii haq to chaahate hain magar apanaa haq to adaa karen qisamat hamaare saath hai jalane vaale jalaa karen ho daddaan daddaan daddaan threedots  naazuk hain vo kalaaiyaan patlii kamar men bal paden ajii sau dedh sau bal paden chalane men moch aae gii parde men vo rahaa karen qisamat hamaare saath hai jalane vaale jalaa karen ho daddaan daddaan daddaan threedots  jalaa karen maraa karen galaa karen sadaa karen jalaa karen maraa karen galaa karen sadaa karen apanii manahuus shakal le ham ko na vo dikhaa karen qisamat hamaare saath hai jalane vaale jalaa karen ho daddaan daddaan daddaan threedots   kushiyaan manaaen kyon na ham ham kisii se kyon daren qisamat hamaare saath hai jalane vaale jalaa karen ho daddaan daddaan daddaan daddaan daddaan daddaan daddaa ddaan  dekho to unakii shokiyaan ham se karen muqaabalaa unase kaho ke roz vo duudh aur ghii piyaa karen qisamat hamaare saath hai jalane vaale jalaa karen ho daddaan daddaan daddaan threedots  naazuk hain vo kalaaiyaan patlii kamar men bal paden ajii sau dedh sau bal paden chalane men moch aae gii parde men vo rahaa karen qisamat hamaare saath hai jalane vaale jalaa karen ho daddaan daddaan daddaan threedots  jalaa karen maraa karen galaa karen sadaa karen jalaa karen maraa karen galaa karen sadaa karen apanii manhuus shakal le ham ko naa vo dikhaa karen qisamat hamaare saath hai jalane vaale jalaa karen ho daddaan daddaan daddaan threedots

Title: nagarii merii kab tak  ai chaand ummidon ko  aavaaz do insaaf ko
Lyrics: nagarii merii kab tak yuun hii barabaad rahegii duniyaa a duniyaa yahii duniyaa hai to kyaa yaad rahegii nagarii merii kab tak yuun hii barabaad rahegii  aakaash pe nikharaa huaa hai chaand kaa mukhadaa bastii men gariibon kii andhere kaa hai dukhadaa duniyaa a duniyaa yahii duniyaa hai to kyaa yaad rahegii nagarii merii threedots  kab hogaa saveraa kab hogaa saveraa koii ai kaash bataa de kis vaqt tak ai ghuumate aakaash bataa de insaanon par insaan kii bedaad rahegii  kahakaaron se kaliyon ke chaman guunj rahaa hai jharanon ke madhur raag se ban guunj rahaa hai par meraa to par meraa to par meraa to fariyaad se man guunj rahaa hai par meraa to fariyaad se man guunj rahaa hai kab tak mere honthon pe ye fariyaad rahegii nagarii merii threedots ai chaand ummiidon ko merii shammaa dikhaa de ai chaand ummiidon ko merii shammaa dikhaa de duube hue khoe hue suuraj kaa pataa de rote hue jug biit gayaa ab to hansaa de ai mere himaalaa mujhe ye baat bataa de ai mere himaalaa mujhe ye baat bataa de hogii merii bastii bhii kabhii kair se aabaad nagarii merii barabaad hai barabaad hai barabaad barabaad hai barabaad nagarii merii threedots  jo aankh kaa aansuu hai jo aahon kaa dhuaan hai jo aankh kaa aansuu hai jo aahon kaa dhuaan hai vaarii meraa dil us pe nichhaavar merii jaan hai mujarim huun gunaahagaar huun us ko ye gumaan hai aavaaz do insaaf ko insaaf kahaan hai aavaaz do insaaf ko insaaf kahaan hai ik bekasomajabuur pe ye zulm ye bedaad nagarii merii barabaad hai barabaad hai barabaad barabaad hai barabaad nagarii merii threedots

Title: bedard zamaane kyaa terii

Lyrics: mere piyaa to basen parades re haae basant rut kyon aaii tuu pawan naa kar athakeliyaan mere dil kii kalii murajhaaii  mere piyaa to basen threedots  piyaa piyaa papiihaa gaataa hai dil gam men duubaa jaataa hai praanon ko lage hai thes re haae basant rut kyon aaii mere piyaa to basen threedots  sanwariyaa naataa tod gaye ik dard saa dil men chhod gaye bhejhaa naa koii sandes re haae basant rut kyon aaii mere piyaa to basen threedots  phir phuul phuul musakaane lagaa mujhe apanaa phuul yaad aane laga phuulon kaa badal kar bhes re haae basant rut kyon aaii mere piyaa to basen threedots  bagiyaa men kisii kii bansii na bajii raajaa na aaye raanii na sajii bansii na bajii raanii na sajii ujadaa mere man kaa des re haae basant rut kyon aaii mere piyaa to basen threedots

Lyrics: main zindagii men haradam rotaa hii rahaa huun rotaa hii rahaa huun tadapataa hii rahaa huun main zindagii threedots  ummiid ke diye bujhe dil men hai andheraa jiivan kaa saathii na banaa koi bhii meraa phir kisake liye phir kisake liye aaj main jiitaa hii rahaa huun main zindagii threedots  rahrah ke hansaa hai merii haalat pe zamaanaa kyaa dukh hai mujhe ye to kisii ne bhii na jaanaa kaamosh kaamosh mohabbat liye phirataa hii rahaa huun main zindagii threedots  aai na mujhe raas mohabbat kii phizaayen sharamaai merii aankh se saavan kii ghataaen laharon men sadaa laharon men sadaa gam ko bahaataa hii rahaa huun main zindagii threedots

Lyrics: kabhii panghat pe aa jaa mere sapanon ke raajaa  aa jaa aa jaa kabhii panghat pe aa jaa  jise chaahuun main paanii pilaa duun main paanii pilaa duun use duniyaa kaa sab kuchh bhulaa duun main sab kuchh bhulaa duun tere hosh bhii ganvaa duun zaraa nain to milaa jaa kabhii panghat pe aa jaa  merii gagrii se pii lo paanii aa ke jaae naa usakii javaanii paanii piine ke bahaane dil kii pyass to bhujaa jaa kabhii panghat pe aa jaa  tere liye main panghat pe aauun paniyaan bharan kaa bahaanaa banaauun kahiin dekhe na zamaanaa raajaa chorii chorii aajaa kabhii panghat pe aa jaa

Title: ho ho ho chaandanii raat hai
Lyrics: ho ho ho chaandanii raat hai 2 aise men aa jaavo ho more baalam 2 kyaa baat hai ho ho ho chaandanii raat hai 2  ek judaaii terii duuje jiyaa na maane 2 ghadiighadii aahen bharbhar ke lagaa sataane tere binaa ho re ho more rasiyaa 2 dil jaat hai ho ho ho chaandanii raat hai 2  aa more baalam qasam morii re 2 tuu meraa ho rasiyaa main terii re terii re koii ishaaron men tohe ye baalam 2 samajhaat hai ho ho ho chaandanii raat hai 2 aise men aa jaavo ho more baalam 2 kyaa baat hai ho ho ho chaandanii raat hai 2

Title: ik yaad kisii ki yaad rahii
Lyrics: gmd ik yaad kisii ki yaad rahii aur saarii duniyaa bhuul gaye dil gam ke giit sunaataa hai aaraam kaa nagamaa bhuul gaye  sha hai dil ke saaz kii duharii lay dukhdard bhii hai aaraam bhii hai kyuun gam kii lambhii taanon men tum giit kushii kaa bhuul gaye ik yaad kisii ki yaad rahii aur saarii duniyaa bhuul gaye  gmd kyuunkar main hansuun dil rotaa hai ab kuun bhii aansuu hotaa hai beaas jahaan men rote hain jiine kii tamannaa bhuul gaye ik yaad kisii ki yaad rahii aur saarii duniyaa bhuul gaye  sha jo taaraa duubaa chamakegaa jo shamaa buujhiihaan jal jaayegii shab guzaregii din nikalegaa aur naii kushii phir aayegii kyuun gam kii andherii raaton men tum din kaa nikalanaa bhuul gaye ik yaad tumahaarii  gmd haan yaad tumahaarii  donon yaad rahii aur saarii duniyaa bhuul gaye ik yaad tumahaarii yaad rahii yaad rahii

Title: kaliyon ko masalane aae hain

Lyrics: kaliyon ko masalane aae hain phuulon ko jalaane aae hain is baag kii daalii daalii men vo aag lagaane aae hain kaliyon ko masalane aae hain  mahamaan banaayaa thaa unako aankhon pe bithaayaa thaa unako maaluum na thaa vo jiivan ko viiraan banaane aae hain kaliyon ko masalane aae hain  vo apane giiton ke tohafe le jaaen hamaarii mahafil se ham amrit ke matavaalon ko vo zahar pilaane aae hain kaliyon ko masalane aae hain

Title: tuu kahe agar jiivan bhar main giit sunaataa jaauun
Lyrics: tuu kahe agar tuu kahe agar tuu kahe agar jiivan bhar main giit sunaataa jaaun man biin bajaataa jaaun tuu kahe agar  main saaz huun tuu saragam hai  2 detii jaa sahaare mujhako  2 main raag huun tu binaa hai  2 is dam jo pukaare tujhako aavaaz men teri har dam aavaaz milaataa jaauun aakaash pe chhaataa jaauun tu kahe agarthreedots  in bolon men tuu hii tuu hai main samajhuun yaa tuu jaane ho jaane inamen hai kahaanii merii inamen hai tere afasaane inamen hai tere afasaane tu saaz uthaa ulfat kaa main jhuum ke gaataa jaauun sapanon ko jagaataa jaauun tuu kahe agarthreedots

Title: rangiin gagan piichhe chhutaa
Lyrics: rangiin gagan piichhe chhuutaa 2 anuraag aur armaanon kaa rangiin gagan piichhe chhutaa ashaa kii raajahansiinii kaa sukhasapanon se nataa tuutaa  bah gae ashq rah gayii aag 2 shabanam se sholay uthe jaag naahak apane haathon se ham ne nasiib apanaa luutaa  anuraag aur armaanon kaa rangiin gagan piichhe chhutaa  kachchii sahmii aur nanhii kalii gul hii ke haatho gaii chhalii dil nazuk phuul ke pyaale saa ek thokar lagate hii tuutaa  anuraag aur armaanon kaa rangiin gagan piichhe chhutaa ashaa kii rajahansiinii kaa sukhsapanon se nataa tuutaa  rangiin gagan piichhe chhutaa

Title: aaye raghuviir aaye gangaa ke tiir
Lyrics: aaye raghuviir aaye gangaa ke tiir aaye  2 aaye raghuviir aaye gangaa ke tiir  e sang siitaa maiyaaaaaa sang siitaa maiyaa aur lachhaman se viir  aaye raghuviir aaye gangaa ke tiir aaye aaye raghuviir aaye gangaa ke tiir  kesar phal phuul paan laao sab mewaa 2 hilmil sab aaj karen raghupati kii sewaa 2 duhiiduhii laao madhur gaiyan ko ghii  2 aaye raghuviir aaye gangaa ke tiir aaye aaye raghuviir aaye gangaa ke tiir  kaun raghuviir itii kaahe ko aaye avadhaptii raajaa dasharath ke jaaye kaun lakhanaviir kaun sitaa maaii raanii raghuviir kii ve aur lakhan bhaaii  chalo chalo 8 chalo chalo darashan ko aaye raghuviir 2 aaye raghuviir aaye gangaa ke tiir aaye aaye raghuviir aaye gangaa ke tiir  jinake sang jhuum rahii bhainsii naanaadii  komal kaladhaam komal kaladhaam vikal paaladaa jo haarii  sabako man moh let saanvaro sariir 2  aaye raghuviir aaye gangaa ke tiir aaye  4

Title: do din kii kushii raas na aaii mere jii ko
Lyrics: do din kii kushii haay do din kii kushii do din kii kushii raas na aaii mere jii ko dil tod diyaa haay dil tod diyaa dil tod diyaa aag lage aisii kushii ko do din kii kushii haay do din kii kushii  kahataa hai ye roro ke meraa dard bharaa dil dard bharaa dil apanaa na banaaye apanaa na banaaye koii duniyaa men kisii ko duniyaa men kisii ko  dil tod diyaa haay dil tod diyaa dil tod diyaa aag lage aisii kushii ko  jo dil pe guzaratii hai wo kahate nahiin banatii kahate nahiin banatii baithe hain chhupaaye huye baithe hain chhupaaye huye ham dil kii lagii ko ham dil kii lagii ko  do din kii kushii haay do din kii kushii do din kii kushii raas na aaii mere jii ko  the aur bhii duniyaa men muhabbat ke pujaarii muhabbat ke pujaarii taqadiir ne kyuun luut liyaa taqadiir ne kyuun luut liyaa haay mujhii ko haay mujhii ko  dil tod diyaa haay dil tod diyaa dil tod diyaa aag lage aisii kushii ko

Lyrics: banatii nazar aatii nahiin tadabiir hamaarii mar jaayenge tab jaagegii takadiir hamaarii  kyuun mast havaaen hamen aa aa ke sataayen kuchh yaad dilaayen bijalii sii giraayen dil tuut chukaa lut chukii jaagiir hamaarii  jii chaahataa hai aag jamaane men lagaa duun duniyaa ko jalaa duun baakii nahiin ab aahon men taasiir hamaarii

Title: aaii bahaar aaj aaii bahaar
Lyrics: aa haa haa aaii bahaar aaj aaii bahaar aa aa aa aaii bahaar aaj aaii bahaar gulashan men gulashan men liye phuulon ke haar aa aa aa aaii bahaar aaj aaii bahaar aa aa aa aaii bahaar aaj aaii bahaar aa haa haa  mere dil men bhii taazaa umangen badhiin 2 aarazuuyen badhii aur kaisii badhiin liye phuulon ke haar aaii bahaar aaj aaii bahaar aa aa aa aaii bahaar aaj aaii bahaar aa haa haa   mastii se daalii jo yuun jhuum uthiin is mast se inakii aankhen ladiin  2 aaj har phuul par aaj har phuul par hai naii taazagii rang chuukhaa anokhaa hai kushbuu naii andaliiben pukaariin jyuun hii ye sunaa liye phuulon ke haar aa aa aa aaii bahaar aaj aaii bahaar aa haa haa  aaj phuulon kaa bulabul se biyaah hone ko hai 2  aaj thaalon men sandal aane ko hai aaj pyaalon men ubatan aane ko hai  2 aavo taraane chheden naye aao miljul ke gaane gaayen naye aao shaadii rachaayen shor ham sab naye hai ye shaadii naii aao duniyaa badalane kaa din aa gayaa liye phuulon ke haar aaii bahaar aaj aaii bahaar aa aa aa aaii bahaar aaj aaii bahaar

Title: kisii diipak kii dhun men bechaaraa jalataa hai patangaa pyaaraa
Lyrics: kisii diipak kii dhun men bichaaraa jalataa hai patangaa pyaaraa  2   aa tujhako bahanaa rastaa dikhaa de ho raste men laakhon diipak jalaa de  2 ye chaandtaare laakar bichhaa de 2  jaan gaii jaan gaii bhed saaraa jalataa hai patangaa pyaaraa  2  kisii diipak kii dhun men bichaaraa jalataa hai patangaa pyaaraa   isake siwaa kuchh nahiin mere bas men ho dochaar men kyaa kar duun main bas men  2 bahanaa vaarii paatii kyuun bas men 2 dikhalaa duun main diipbattii aaraa haay raam  dikhalaa duun main diipbattii aaraa  jalataa hai patangaa pyaaraa  kisii diipak kii dhun men bichaaraa jalataa hai patangaa pyaaraa   aa tujhako bahanaa rastaa dikhaa de ho raste men laakhon diipak jalaa de  2 ye chaandtaare laakar bichhaa de 2  jaan gaii jaan gaii bhed saaraa jalataa hai patangaa pyaaraa  2  kisii diipak kii dhun men bichaaraa jalataa hai patangaa pyaaraa

Title: piipal kii chhanv tale main bhii miluun tuu bhii mile
Lyrics: zo  piipal kii chhanv tale main bhii miluun tuu bhii mile aankhen hon chaar main huun tuu ho aur koii na ho manzuur tumhen a  manzuur  phuulon ko tod tod palakon men jod jod pahanaauun haar main huun tuu ho aur koii na ho manzuur tumhen zo  manzuur  priit lagaa ke hamen na bhulaanaa nainon se naa tuu nain churaanaa aanaa aake phir na jaana chaand chhupe tuu na chhupe diip bujhe tuu na bujhe tan man duun vaar main huun tuu ho aur koii na ho manzuur tumhen a  manzuur  do  piipal kii chhanv tale threedots  a jhuul rahaa hai laharon kaa bichhonaa soye meraa chaand salonaa sapanon kaa aake jagaanaa main bhii hansuun tuu bhii hanse jiivan ke taar baje jiivan ke taar main huun tuu ho aur koii na ho manzuur tumhen a  manzuur

Title: ham kochavaan pyaare
Lyrics: ham kochavaan ham kochavaan ham kochavaan pyaare hain duniyaa bhar ke log hamaarii aankhon ke taare ham kochavaan threedots   saarii duniyaa kii hansii khushii saare sansaar kaa gam le jaaye uthaa kar ham ham kochavaan threedots   koii pyaar karen yaa vaar karen ham mast sadaa rahate aur munh se yahii kahate auro se hamen kyaa lenaa denaa ham sab se nyaare ham kochavaan threedots   jab chaand se sudhaa barasatii hai aur saarii duniyaa hansatii hai jab bichhade do dil milane par har ujadii bastii basatii hai jab premii prem kii mastii bharii mastaanii taan udaate hain ham inako udhaar le jaate hain ham unako idhar le aate hain chalanii hamaarii tiktiktiktik kar ke gaadii sab ke sahaare ham kochavaan threedots

Title: tumhaare bulaane ko jii chaahataa hai jii chaahataa hai
Lyrics: tumhaare bulaane ko jii chaahataa hai jii chaahataa hai muqaddar banaane ko jii chaahataa hai jii chaahataa hai  yah jii chaahataa hai ke tumhaarii bhii sun luun tumhaarii bhii sun luun  2 khud apanii sunaane ko jii chaahataa hai jii chaahataa hai tumhaare bulaane ko threedots  tumhaarii mohabbat men khoii huii huun khoii huii huun  2 tumhen yah bataane ko jii chaahataa hai jii chaahataa hai tumhaare bulaane ko threedots  jo tum aao to saath khushiyaan bhii aaen khushiyaan bhii aaen  2 zaraa muskuraane ko jii chaahataa hai jii chaahataa hai tumhaare bulaane ko threedots

Title: koii mere dil men kushii banake aayaa
Lyrics: koii mere dil men kushii banake aayaa andheraa thaa ghar men raushanii banake aayaa koii mere dil men  dhadakataa hai dil jaag uthii hain umangen mohabbat kii vo zindagii ban ke aayaa koii mere dil men  mohabbat ne chhedaa hai saaz dil kaa vo har taar kii raaginii ban ke aayaa koii mere dil men  samaayaa thaa dil men jo ik dard banakar vo honthon pe merii hansii ban ke aayaa koii mere dil men

Title: tuut gaii daalii  ab kahaan baseraa apanaa
Lyrics: tuut gaii daalii bikhar gae tinake ab kahaan baseraa apanaa  chaand ghiraa badalii men taare tuut gae kathin dagariyaa pag dole mere saathii chhuut gae ab kahaan baseraa threedots  na aankh hotii na koii chubhataa na ranj hote na pyaar hote qasam tumhaarii na tum pe marate na dil lagaate na kvaar hote chaand ghiraa badalii threedots

Title: o priitam pyaare chhod chalii gharbaar
Lyrics: o priitam pyaare chhod chalii gharbaar tujhase duur tujhase duur  bhar aaye nainaa nainnain kaa pyaar jab se duur jab se duur   kyuun aafat sar pe mol le tuu mere vaaste tuu apane mahal men raaj kar main apane raaste  2 tujh ko sukh ho to mujhako piyaa parades bhii manzuur hai manzuur   karatii thii tujhako pyaar main badanaamii le chalii choriichorii kaa khel thaa  juramaanaa de chalii  2 ik dil thaa meraa wo bhii thokaren khaa ke chakanaachuur chakanaachuur   phaagun men holii khelanaa saawan men jhuulanaa jabjab chamakegaa chaand tuu mujhako naa bhuulanaa  2 mere tuute man men abhii tumhaaraa pyaar hai bharapuur hai bharapuur  o priitam pyaare chhod chalii gharbaar tujhase duur tujhase duur

Title: o dukhiyaa jiyaara tose nainaa

Title: o o o o mujhe kisii se pyaar ho gayaa
Lyrics: o o o o mujhe kisii se pyaar ho gayaa  2 pyaar ho gayaa dil beqaraar ho gayaa beqaraar ho gayaa o o o o mujhe threedots  dard chaahaa thaa hamane chhipaanaa khul gayaa phir bhii dil kaa fasaanaa dil ne ye kyaa kiyaa o salone piyaa moraa dhadake jiyaa o o o o mujhe threedots  jo chhipaanaa maine chaahaa aankhon ne kah diyaa aur jo mainne kahanaa chaahaa dil men hii rah gayaa o o o o mujhe threedots  aankhon aankhon men kar ke ishaare kisane dil se kahaa ham tumhaare haay ye kyaa kiyaa o salone piyaa moraa dhadake jiyaa o o o o mujhe threedots

Title: alam par alam sitam par sitam
Lyrics: alam par alam sitam par sitam ham uthaae hue hain zamaane kii garadish ke piise hue hain muqaddar ke hathon mitaae hue hain alam par alam sitam par sitam ham uthaae hue hain  na hamadam hai koii na damsaaz koii na hamdaard koii na hamraaz koii faqat saath hai ik musiibat hamaare kaleje se us ko lagaae hue hain alam par alam sitam par sitam ham uthaae hue hain  hai qisamat jo ulatii samajh bhii hai ulatii nigaah bhii hai ulatii har ik baat ulatii nazar aatii hai dushamanii dostii men jahaan bhar ko dushaman banaae hue hain alam par alam sitam par sitam ham uthaae hue hain

Title: paradesii kyuun yaad aataa hai
Lyrics: paradesii kyuun yaad aataa hai paradesii kyuun yaad aataa hai  ik chaand chhamak kar jangal men chhupchhup kar uudhe badal men jab sapanaa saa dikhalaataa hai paradesii kyuun yaad aataa hai paradesii  puurab se pawan jab aatii hai jab koyal kuuk sunaatii hai jab baadal ghir ke aataa hai paradesii kyuun yaad aataa hai paradesii  hiradhe kii ghanerii chhaaon kaa armaanon kaa aashaaon kaa jab ghuunghat pat khul jaataa hai paradesii kyuun yaad aataa hai paradesii  jab biite din yaad aate hain badal kii tarah mandalaate hain jab ghaayal dil ghabaraataa hai paradesii kyuun yaad aataa hai paradesii

Lyrics: chhaayaa merii ummiid kii duniyaa men andheraa ab ye kise maaluum hai kab hogaa saveraa  2  kho jaaye naa mil kar kahiin ulfat kaa kazaanaa kahiin ulfat kaa kazaanaa kho jaaye naa mil kar kahiin ulfat kaa kazaanaa rah jaaye na lut kar kahiin aramaanon kaa deraa ab ye kise maaluum hai kab hogaa saveraa  khilane bhii na paaiin abhii kaliyaan mere dil kii abhii kaliyaan mere dil kii khilane bhii na paaiin abhii kaliyaan mere dil kii dil tod ke gam ne kiyaa pahaluu men baseraa ab ye kise maaluum hai kab hogaa saveraa  sunataa nahiin koii kise main jaa ke sunaauun kise main jaa ke sunaauun sunataa nahiin koii kise main jaa ke sunaauun dukhdard men duubaa huaa afasaanaa hai meraa ab ye kise maaluum hai kab hogaa saveraa  chhaayaa merii ummiid kii duniyaa men andheraa ab ye kise maaluum hai kab hogaa saveraa

Lyrics: ab to nahiin duniyaa men kahiin apanaa thikaanaa dushman hai zamaanaa ab kis se kahen kaun sune apanaa fasaanaa dushman hai zamaanaa  maanaa ke har ek  tarah se laachaar hue hain sab kaam hamaare liye dushvaar hue hain lekin kabhii sadamon se dare hain na darenge sab sahate rahenge ban jaayenge taqadiir ke tiiron kaa nishaanaa dushman hai zamaanaa  aaegaa agar jii men ki royen to hansenge2 is tarah jiyenge soyii huii taqadiir ko aataa hai jagaanaa dushman hai zamaanaa

Lyrics: aa a a ai prem terii balihaarii ho ham nayaa qariinaa siikh gae jii kar to maranaa sakaa ab mar kar jiinaa siikh gae ai prem terii balihaarii ho   in mad bhare nainon ne tere kyuun aankhon aankhon pilaayii hai pyaalon se piine vaale bhii binpyaale piinaa siikh gae ai prem terii balihaarii ho threedots  dukhdard diyaa biimaar kiyaa ab kud hii tasallii dete hain zakmon ke lagaane vaale hii zakamon kaa siinaa siikh gae ai prem terii balihaarii ho threedots

Lyrics: phir nain baanvare bhar bhar aaye haay bhar bhar aaye aahon kii ot men nikale mere dil se haay haay phir nain baanvare threedots  ek to suunii sej hamaarii duuje rain andherii tiije pahare pe duniyaa hai peshh na jaaye merii jab yaad tumhaarii aaye meraa nanhaa saa jiyaraa dhadak jaaye phir nain baanvare threedots  ruupaa na maanguu sonaa na maanguu maanguun tose ye daam haad maas kaa pinjaraa jaaye saans aaye na aaye mere lab pe rahe piyaa kaa naam vo pyaar kare ham donon jis pyaar ke kisse jag gaaye phir nain baanvare threedots

Lyrics: din pe din biite jaayen jaane waale na aayen main kyaa karuun  2   mat puuchho dil kii baat piyaa hamase na guzare raat piyaa  2 main tum ban jaauun ek baar tum main ban jaao 2 aur haath karejawaa pe rakhrakh ke tum bhii gaao lo aa gaiin mast hawaayen lo baadal hamen daraayen kaho main kyaa karuun  din pe din biite jaayen jaane waale na aayen main kyaa karuun   ye raat chaandanii dekh meraa dil roye meraa dil roye  2 kyaa karuun hamaare piyaa na jaane hoye 2 unake dil pe bhii thes lage to jaanuun 2 wo tadaptadap ye gaayen to jaanuun 2 lo aa gaiin mast hawaayen lo baadal hamen daraayen kaho main kyaa karuun  din pe din biite jaayen jaane waale na aayen main kyaa karuun

Title: tum ne mujh se prem jataa kar
Lyrics: moviewapas   tum ne mujh se prem jataa kar duniyaa se begaanaa kiyaa dil thaa ek sukh duhkh kaa saathii us ko bhii diivaanaa kiyaa tum ne threedots   dil kaa shiishaa naazuk shiishaa thes lagii bas chuur huaa biitii jo kuchh mujh par biitii logon ne afasaanaa kiyaa tum ne threedots   haa aa aa aa  tum se jo us din aankh lagii ab tak na hamaarii aankh lagii dard kaa saudaa mol liyaa sukh chain tumhen nazaraanaa kiyaa tum ne threedots

Title: phuulon kaa sapanaa dekhane waalo
Lyrics: phuulon kaa sapanaa dekhane waalo kaaton pe chalanaa siikh lo ajii o apane haathon apanii qismat khud badalanaa siikh lo haaye re phuulon kaa sapanaa threedots  bade atapate jagat ke raste chale chalo re bhaii rote hasate yahaan bhuulbhuulaiyaa kahiin kahiin hain taaltalaiyaa kahiin kahiin dhokhe kaa jaal hai har taraf zaraa bachake nikalanaa siikh lo haaye re phuulon kaa sapanaa threedots  mat aane do aankh men paanii kamajorii kii hai yeh nishaanii baadal kii kadak se mat daro bijalii kii tadak se mat daro tum tuufaanon ke biich bhii bedhadak tehalanaa siikh lo thokar pe thokar lagen magar tum phir bhii sanbhalanaa siikh lo haaye re phuulon kaa sapanaa threedots

Title: ye afasaanaa nahiin zaalim mere dil kii haqiiqat hai
Lyrics: ye afasaanaa nahiin zaalim mere dil kii haqiiqat hai mujhe tum se mohabbat hai mujhe tum se mohabbat hai ye afasaanaathreedots  lagii hai aag siine men nahiin kuchh lutf jiine men nazar kuchh kah nahiin sakatii kahe bin rah nahiin sakatii tumhen kayonkar main samajhaauun mujhe tum se mohabbat hai ye afasaanaathreedots  machaltii hain tamannaaen kahiin rusuvaa na ho jaaen musiibat uljhanen dil kii qayaamat dhadakanen dil kii tumhen kayonkar main samajhaauun mujhe tum se mohabbat hai ye afasaanaathreedots  na jiitii huun na maratii huun kalish mehasuus karatii huun kahiin aisaa na ho jaae kalii khilate hii murjhaae tumhen kayonkar main samajhaauun mujhe tum se mohabbat hai ye afasaanaathreedots

Title: tumhiin kaho meraa man kyuun rahe udaas nahiin
Lyrics: tumhii kaho a a  tumhiin kaho meraa man kyuun rahe udaas nahiin tum mere paas bhii ho phir bhii mere paas nahiin  chaandii kii doliiyon men baith ke nikalii hain taaron kii toliyaan chandaa se khel rahii hain vo tim tim tim chandaa se khel rahii hain vo aankh michauliyaan aankh michauliyaan machaa hai raas vahaan aur main udaas yahaan mere dil men hai andheraa haae koii ujaas nahiin tum mere paas bhii ho threedots  tumhaare qadamon pe apanii duniyaa lutaane aayii huun main raajaa tumhaare dar pe khadii hai merii muhabbat ho ho a a tumhaare dar pe khadii hai merii muhabbat kholo daravaazaa kholo daravaazaa mere sapanon ke sahaare tum ko merii priit pukaare binaa tumhaare mere jiivan men koii mithaas nahiin tum mere paas bhii ho threedots

Title: merii mittii kii duniyaa niraalii
Lyrics: merii mittii kii duniyaa niraalii oaa jahaan bhagawaan basen   phuulon se rang churaayaa kaanton se dard milaayaa komal saa pankhadiyon se belon ne pyaar sidhaayaa main huun sundaraban kaa maalii oaa jahaan bhagawaan basen threedots  hiranon ne aankhen pheriin moron ne naach sikhaayaa madh bharii koyal kii kuu kuu pii pii papiihaa ne gayaa ban ke panchhii kii umadaa nishaanii oaa jahaan bhagawaan basen threedots  gurbon kaa saath jahaan hai pariyon kaa naach jahaan hai sundar taanon kaa rasiilaa prem kaa giit jahaan hai main ne jaaduu kii nagarii basaa lii oaa jahaan bhagawaan basen threedots   hon jahaan chaandanii raaten pyaaromuhabbat kii ghaaten sundar sunaharaa jiivan ho kyuun na hon pyaar kii baaten tuu ne gangaa kii nadiyaa bahaalii oaa jahaan bhagawaan basen threedots  jiivan men thaa jo andheraa kiranon ne kiyaa saveraa khilaa kamal hai suhaanaa swarg banaa ghar teraa tuu ne priit nagariyaa basaalii oaa jahaan bhagawaan basen threedots

Lyrics: laaraa lappaa laaraa lappaa laaii rakhadaa 3 adiidappa adiidappa laaii rakhadaa  ho dekar jhuuthe laare 2 laaraa lappaa laaraa lappaa laaii rakhadaa adiidappa adiidappa laaii rakhadaa 2  baabuujii kii baat niraalii 2 dil bhii kaalii jeb bhii kaalii 2 ho phir bhii akad dikhaae o baabuujii phir bhii akad dikhaae o baabuujii samajh na aae re  laaraa lappaa laaraa lappaa laaii rakhadaa adiidappa adiidappa laaii rakhadaa 2  baabuujii se maange paise 2 baabuujii bole paise kaise 2 jaa len den par kaaq muhabbat paak bade faramaa gae hain  2  laaraa lappaa laaraa lappaa laaii rakhadaa adiidappa adiidappa laaii rakhadaa 5 ho dekar jhuuthe laare 3 laaraa lappaa laaraa lappaa laaii rakhadaa adiidappa adiidappa laaii rakhadaa 2  aajakal ke jentalamen 2 rahate hain haradam bechain kaalii jeb matakate nain 2 kaam kare na kaaj 2 phir bhii akad dikhaae o baabuujii phir bhii akad dikhaae o baabuujii samajh na aae re  laaraa lappaa laaraa lappaa laaii rakhadaa adiidappa adiidappa laaii rakhadaa 2  aajakal kii naariyaan aajakal kii naariyaan hai muft kii biimaariyaan biimaariyaan raat din mardon se ladane kii kare taiyyaariyaan taiyyaariyaan kaam kuchh karatii nahiin aur baandhatii hai saadiyaan 2  laaraa lappaa laaraa lappaa laaii rakhadii adiidappa adiidappa laaii rakhadii laaraa lappaa laaraa lappaa laaii rakhadaa adiidappa adiidappa laaii rakhadaa ho dekar jhuuthe laare 2  fikr kyon karate ho saaheb 2 ye bhii kar dikhalaaenge 2 vaqt aaegaa to is kursii pe ham dat jaaenge dat jaaenge 2  laaraa lappaa laaraa lappaa laaii rakhadaa adiidappa adiidappa laaii rakhadaa 2

Lyrics: duur jaaye re 4 raah merii aaj terii raah se duur kahiin duur duur duur jaaye re duur jaaye re  duur se hii maang rahii o piyaa aaj tumase aaj tumase aakharii bidaaii re raah merii aaj terii raah se duur kahiin duur duur duur jaaye re  zindagii ko koii kahataa ik safar ik safar kahaanii do dinon kii hai ye kahataa hai koii par mujhase puuchho to kahuungii zindagii muhabbat aur musiibat kaa mahaasangraam hai mere pyaar ne to ye sansaar se haar maan liinii aaj haay re raah merii aaj terii raah se duur kahiin duur duur duur jaaye re

Lyrics: o dupattaa rang de meraa rangarez ho gaii sarason piiliipiilii  2 aaj harii kal laal chadariyaa parason odhuun niilii 2 o dupattaa rang de meraa rangarez ho gaii sarason piiliipiilii  suboh ko pahanuun to sajanawaa aaspaas mandalaaye 2  shaam ko pahanuun to balam ghar chhod kahiin na jaaye balam ghar chhod kahiin na jaaye  2 raat andherii ho to ho jaauun juganuun sii chamakiilii 2  o dupattaa rang de meraa rangarez ho gaii sarason piiliipiilii  man men naii umang ang men chunarii dhiiliidhiilii 2 apane piyaa se kuchh na siikhuun 2 jab na mujhe tan dhiilii pad gaii jab na mujhe tan dhiilii honth ranguun main laalgulaabii aankhon se sharmiilii 2  o dupattaa rang de meraa rangarez ho gaii sarason piiliipiilii

Title: dar naa mohabbat kar le
Lyrics: la dar naa mohabbat kar le 2   ulfat se jholii bhar le   duniyaa hai chaar din kii   jii le chaahe mar le   ho o do dar naa mohabbat kar le 2  la duniyaa faanii tuu bhii faanii   letaa jaa ulfat kii nishaanii sh do lafazon kii ek kahaanii   ek mohabbat ek javaanii   yaad ise tuu kar le 2 do dar naa mohabbat kar le 2 la ulfat se jholii bhar le threedots   ho o do dar naa mohabbat kar le 2  sh duniyaa to kaanton kaa ek van hai   aur ulfat phuulon kaa chaman hai la kar le vahii jo dil kii lagan hai   soch naa manzil dil kii kathin hai   ho dil kii kathin hai   is manzil se guzar le 2   dar naa mohabbat kar le 2 sh ulfat se jholii bhar lethreedots   ho o do dar naa mohabbat kar le 2  la kahanaa jo tumane meraa na maanaa   piichhe padegaa phir pachhataanaa sh dekh le apanaa   kar le thikaanaa   ye hai mohabbat   vo hai zamaanaa 2 do hans le yaa aahen bhar le 2   dar naa mohabbat kar le 2

Lyrics: ud jaavuun re 2 main to taaron kii main to taaron kii duniyaa men ud jaavuun re ud jaavuun re 2 main to taaron kii duniyaa men ud jaavuun re  aaj jo main pankh kahiin paauun re paauun re sapanon kii nagarii men main ud jaavuun re jaavuun re taaron ko  tod laauun re ud jaavuun re 2 main to taaron kii duniyaa men ud jaavuun re  diikhate hain dekho kitane pyaarepyaare niilam kii thaalii men chamcham sitaare aapas men khel rahe aankhmicholii 2 main man men lalachaauun re ud jaavuun re 2 main to taaron kii duniyaa men ud jaavuun re  merii jawaanii ne kholii hai paankhen aaj milaavungii aaj milaavungii main chandaa se aankhen e e chandaa se aankhen chal mere manavaa aakaash kii or 2 main tujhape waar jaavuun re ud jaavuun re 2 main to taaron kii duniyaa men ud jaavuun re

Title: taqadiir men likhaa hai merii thokaren khaanaa bedard zamaanaa
Lyrics: taqadiir men likhaa hai merii thokaren khaanaa haan bedard zamaanaa 2  ab kaun sune dil kii kahaanii mere pochhegaa kaun aankhon kaa paanii mere ye din isii khaanaa bado ke pyaar kiyaa kyuun pyaar kiyaa marane na diyaa jiinaa bhii dushawaar kiyaa aayaa na chaar din bhii tumhen pyaar nibhaanaa haay pyaar nibhaanaa bedard zamaanaa  maiyaa ne mujhe chhod diyaa baabul ne mukh mod liyaa saajan ne bhii dil tod diyaa haay is dard kii maarii kaa rahaa kaun thikaanaa main kisase aaj ro ke sunaavuun ye fasaanaa sunaavuun ye fasaanaa 2 bedard zamaanaa  hai raat andherii mere dil men hai andheraa mere dil men hai andheraa ujadaa huaa hai aaj meraa kal kaa baseraa haay kal kaa baseraa bhagawaan 4 bhagawaan merii raat kaa kab hogaa saweraa kab tak tujhe manazuur hai yuun mujhako rulaanaa haay mujhako rulaanaa haay 3 bedard zamaanaa 2

Title: dindin joban dhalataa jaaye  tere bin din naahiin biiten re

Lyrics: ta haa haa threedots     main terii tuu meraa     donon kaa sang sang ho baseraa     chhod ke mujhako kidhar chale     bichhade duur hue     main terii tuu meraa bo donon kaa sang sang ho baseraa  ta aao jhuulate chale kinaare ra paanii men ho mahal hamaare     laharlahar men doldol kar     naache pavan chakoraa bo laharlahar men doldol kar     naache pavan chakoraa ta main terii tuu meraa   threedots  ra man kii raanii man pe chhaao     prem hilorii laao ta ghir ghir kaale baadal aaye ra aao maine haath badhaae ta sajan daalane aaj yahaan     miithe sapanon kaa gheraa ta main terii tuu meraa   threedots

Lyrics: bhiigiibhiigii palaken hain aur dil men yaad tumhaarii hai is pe bhii o bedardii pyaar kii baazii haarii hai  tumhen chaahaa ye kyaa kiyaa maine dukh zamaane kaa le liyaa maine kabhii dushman kii bhii na ho jo haalat aaj hamaarii hai is pe bhii o bedardii threedots  are o chaand baadalon men jaa ki meraa chaand bhii hai chhip gayaa ujaalaa kyon rahe jahaan men merii to ujadii duniyaa saarii hai is pe bhii o bedardii threedots

Title: aao chalen manavaa more duur kahiin re
Lyrics: raaj aao chalen manavaa more duur kahiin re  rafi saagar ke chhor kahiin raaj haan haan ambar ke or rafi kshitij bane niid jahaan baadal jhuke ghor raaj more anganaa ke diip banii taaron kii paantii huii re  rafi kalpanaa ke pankh lagaa raaj kalpanaa ke pankh lagaa aao ude duur rafi nithur badaa haay jagat mere sapane kare chuur raaj moraa jiivan re mukt bahe gaa jaao aasaavarii re  rafi bhramar kare gunja raaj naachen mor jahaan sudhbudh bhuul rafi o sundar sundar khile ho aashaa ke nitya naye phuul raaj morii bagiyaa men rah sadaa basant kii bahaar banii re

Lyrics: lataa sun lo dil kaa afasaanaa hoaaa duniyaa dil kii basaa ke naa bhuul jaanaa rafii dil hai teraa diwaanaa hoaaa apanaa ham ko banaa ke naa bhuul jaanaa  lataa saaz uthaayaa hai ulfat ne jhuum rahii hai jawaanii rafii jaise saarii duniyaa hai do dil kii ek kahaanii lataa ham tum gaaen ye gaanaa hoaaa ham se nainaa milaa ke naa bhuul jaanaa  rafii baadal ke sang chandaa dole tere sang man meraa lataa pyaar se duniyaa jagamag saarii pyaar nahiin to andheraa rafii main huun teraa parawaanaa hoaaa dekho aag lagaa ke naa bhuul jaanaa

Lyrics: jay ho jay ho vikramaaditya kii jay ho jay jay se guunj uthaa bhaarat vikramaaditya kii jay ho pardukhbhanjan kii jay ho  apane baahubal se jisane vijay shatru par paaii paraadhiin bhaarat ko jisane swatantrataa dilawaaii vikramaaditya kii jay ho threedots  battis putali ke sinhaasan par jisane sachchaa nyaay kiyaa navaratnon ko ekatrit kar saahitya kalaa kaa daan diyaa  chandaa suuraj men tej rahe jab tak prithvii aabaad rahe tab tak har bhaarat vaasii ke dil men ye sanvath yaad rahe ye vikramsanvath yaad rahe vikramaaditya kii jay ho threedots

Lyrics: koii prem kaa de ke sandesaa haay luut gayaa haay luut gayaa aaj naazuk mere dil kaa shiishaa haay tuut gayaa haay tuut gayaa  aankhon aankhon men dil ko churaayaa chor paayaa magar phir ganvaayaa unake daaman kaa haathon se konaa haay chhuut gayaa haay chhuut gayaa  sunii pahale pahal ye kahaanii huuk uththii to bhadakii jawaanii thes lagane se is dil kaa chhaalaa haay phuut gayaa haay phuut gayaa  khelane ko unhen dil diyaa thaa todane ke lie kab kahaa thaa haathaapaayii men meraa khilaunaa haay tuut gayaa haay tuut gayaa

Lyrics: o haay goregore  goregore goregore mukhade pe gesuu jo chhaa gaye  2 chaandanii raat men baadal kahaan se aa gaye 2  goregore goregore mukhade pe gesuu jo chhaa gaye  2  aainaa dekh ke wo dekhate hii rah gaye wo dekhate hii rah gaye dhiiredhiire sapanon kii laharon men bah gaye wo laharon men bah gaye apanii adaa pe phir kud hii sharamaa gaye 2   goregore goregore mukhade pe gesuu jo chhaa gaye  2   gesuu hate to wohii chaandanii raat thii chhup gaye baadal pahalii sii baat thii  2 chandaa nikal aayaa taare sharamaa gaye 2   goregore goregore mukhade pe gesuu jo chhaa gaye  2

Title: ham ko tumhaaraa hii aasaraa
Lyrics: kisako sunaayen haaledil kisako dikhaayen dardedil  tum ko hii bas pehchaanatii tum hamaare ho na ho  hamako tumhaaraa hii aasaraa tum hamaare ho na ho lab pe tumhaaraa hii naam hai tum hamaare ho na ho hamako tumhaaraa hii aasaraa  saazon men jab tak aavaaz hai ham teraa hii giit gaayenge ham terii priit nibhaayenge tere hii dam se jii rahe tum hamaare ho na ho lab pe tumhaaraa hii naam hai tum hamaare ho na ho hamako tumhaaraa hii aasaraa  bolo mujhe tum javaab do tumase hii meraa savaal hai tere liye beqaraar jo us se hii tuune ye kyaa kiyaa qadamon pe tere hain mar rahen tum hamaare ho na ho lab pe tumhaaraa hii naam hai tum hamaare ho na ho hamako tumhaaraa hii aasaraa  ham ko tumhaaraa hii aasaraa tum hamaare ho na ho lab pe tumhaaraa hii naam hai tum hamaare ho na ho hamako tumhaaraa hii aasaraa  aankhon men kuchh muskuraa diyaa honthon ko bhii kuchh dabaa diyaa main ne jo puuchha savaal to palakon ko niiche jhukaa diyaa duniyaa hii merii badal gaii tum hamaare ho na ho  dhadakan men tum ho basii huii tadpan men tum ho basii huii lekin ham tum na mil sake kaisii ye bebasii huii aankhon men jalataa charaag hai tum hamaare ho na ho threedots  daulat nahiin mujh ko chaahiye aish aur isharat na chaahiye donon jahaan ke muqaabale terii muhabbat hii chaahiye ham to tumahare hain ho chuke tum hamaare ho na ho

Title: o bhangiyon ke raajaa meraa nanhaa saa dil
Lyrics: o bhangiyon ke raajaa meraa nanhaa saa dil bahalaa jaa  o bhangiyon kii raanii tore bin ruuthii hai mose javaanii  tujhase bichhad kar o mere raajaa phuut gaii taqadiir yahaan kahaan hain seth ke ghar kii pakii pakaaii khiir  ruuth gaii jhaaduu mujhase ruuth gaii kothariyaa koii bahaanaa karake aajaa bhangin kii chhokariyaa  itane din se kat na aayaa dhadake chhaatii morii kisii par aa na gaii ho chhailaa kahiin tabiiyat torii  sunaa hai tere des men gorii baanke chhail chhabiile kisii ko ghaayal na kar den yah tere nain katiile  jab main koii chhailaa dekhuun dil meraa bhar aae jab paapii mud kar dekhe terii yaad sataae

Title: bhanwaraa madhuban men mat jaa
Lyrics: e bhanwaraa madhuban men mat jaa re bhanwaraa madhuban men mat jaa abhii kamal kii kalii khilii naa 2 tuu kyuun guunj rahaa re bhanwaraa 2 madhuban men mat jaa re bhanwaraa madhuban men mat jaa  ruuprang kaa lobhiirasiyaa 2 sab ke gun mat gaa o rasiye sab ke gun mat gaa neh lagaa le ek kalii se 2 kaliikalii mat jaa re bhanware 2 madhuban men mat jaa re bhanwaraa madhuban men mat jaa  kis kaaran tuu pad gayaa kaalaa 2 itanii baat bataa o rasiyaa itanii baat bataa udanaa siikhaa nahiin kalii ne 2 man men dhiiraj laa re bhanwaraa 2 madhuban men mat jaa re bhanwaraa madhuban men mat jaa

Lyrics: dekh lii o duniyaa waale terii duniyaa dekh lii 2 thokaren khaatii huii apanii tamannaa dekh lii dekh lii o duniyaa waale terii duniyaa dekh lii   kal hamaaraa dil kisii kii yaad se aabaad thaa yaad se aabaad thaa  2 aaj apane dil men ek hasarat kii duniyaa dekh lii 2  thokaren khaatii huii apanii tamannaa dekh lii dekh lii o duniyaa waale terii duniyaa dekh lii   aaj duniyaa men nahiin koii bhii ham saa badanasiib koii bhii ham saa badanasiib  2 saamane aankhon ke lutatii dil kii duniyaa dekh lii 2  thokaren khaatii huii apanii tamannaa dekh lii dekh lii o duniyaa waale terii duniyaa dekh lii

Title: is desh ke jawaanon ko ab aazamaayaa jaayegaa
Lyrics: is desh ke jawaanon ko ab aazamaayaa jaayegaa aazamaayaa jaayegaa  2  sholaa hai zamiin banii bijalii giraaye aasamaan aag ke sholo pe chalaa desh kaa ye kaarawaan kaun siinaa taan nikale 2 desh mere kaa jawaan hind par wo mar mite uunchaa kare komii nishaan 2 kaun aage badhake pehale pehalii golii khaayegaa aazamaayaa jaayegaa  desh kii vidhavaa pukaare bhaag jinake so gaye saaye sar se utha gaye bachche yatiim ho gaye gurabat kaa ek tuufaan uthaa 2 bahanon se bhaai kho gaye maataaon kii aankhon ke taare rote rote so gaye kaun aaj in deviiyon ke rote dil hansaayegaa aazamaayaa jaayegaa  is desh ke jawaanon ko ab aazamaayaa jaayegaa aazamaayaa jaayegaa  umangen mit rahii hain aaj benaamonishaan ho kar bataa ae kaatibeqisamat likhaa kayaa badagumaan ho kar  tavaqqo thii vo aaen ge to dil ko chain aae gaa magar betaabiyaan utthiin kaleje men jawaan ho kar

Title: rum jhum barase baadaravaa
Lyrics: rum jhum barase baadaravaa mast havaaen aaii piyaa ghar aajaa aajaa piyaa ghar aajaa  ho rum jhum barase baadaravaa mast havaaen aaii piyaa ghar aajaa aajaa piyaa ghar aajaa  kaale kaale baadal ghiir ghiir aa gaye aa gaye aise men tum jaake julamvaa dhaa gaye dhaa gaye saavan kaise biite re main kahaan tum kahaan ho more raajaa aajaa ho more raajaa rum jhum barase baadaravaa   threedots  mujh birahan ke haal pe baadal rote hain rote hain baalam hamare aankh muund kar sote hain sote hain hamako niind na aaye re yaad sataaye torii mukh dikhalaajaa aajaa mukh dikhalaajaa rum jhum barase baadaravaa   threedots  kaa karuun aison se ulfat ho gaii ho gaii unake mast alast nain men kho gaii kho gaii pyaase donon nainanavaa pyaasaa joban moraa morii kasam aajaa aajaa morii kasam aajaa  ho rum jhum barase baadaravaa mast havaaen aaii piyaa ghar aajaa aajaa piyaa ghar aajaa

Lyrics: na jaane kidhar aaj merii naav chalii re na jaane kidhar aaj merii naav chalii re chalii re chalii re merii naav chalii re chalii re chalii re merii naav chalii re koii kahe yahaan chalii koii kahe vahaan chalii koii kahe yahaan chalii koii kahe vahaan chalii man ne kahaa piyaa ke gaanv chalii re piyaa ke gaanv chalii re chalii re chalii re merii naav chalii re   man ke miit mere mil jaa jaldii duniyaa ke saagar men naav merii chal dii man ke miit mere mil jaa jaldii duniyaa ke saagar men naav merii chal dii bilakul akelii bilakul akelii akelii chalii re chalii re chalii re merii naav chalii re na jaane kidhar aaj merii naav chalii re chalii re chalii re merii naav chalii re   uunchii niichii laharon pe naav merii dole man men priit merii pihuu pihuu bole uunchii niichii laharon pe naav merii dole man men priit merii pihuu pihuu bole mere man mujh ko bataa merii manzil kaa pataa mere man mujh ko bataa merii manzil kaa pataa bol mere saajan kii kaun galii re bol mere saajan kii kaun galii re chalii re chalii re merii naav chalii re   na jaane kidharthreedots

Lyrics: dil tadap kar rah gayaa dil tadap kar rah gayaa hasarat machal kar rah gaii rah gaii dekhate hii dekhate duniyaa badal kar rah gaii 2 dil tadap kar rah gayaa hasarat machal kar rah gaii rah gaii  dil kii barabaadii pe ham aansuu bahaa kar rah gaye 2 apanii majabuurii pe qisamat haath mal kar rah gaii 2 dil tadap kar rah gayaa hasarat machal kar rah gaii rah gaii  ab kushii kaisii labon par musakaraahat ab kahaan 2 zindagaanii dard ke  zindagaanii dard ke saanche men dhal kar rah gaii dil tadap kar rah gayaa hasarat machal kar rah gaii rah gaii

Lyrics: zindaa huun is tarah ki gamezindagii nahiin jalataa huaa diyaa huun magar roshanii nahiin zindaa huun threedots  vo muddaten huin hain kisise judaa hue lekin ye dil ki aag abhii tak bujhii nahiin zindaa huun threedots  aane ko aa chukaa thaa kinaaraa bhii samane khud usake paas hii merii naiyyaa gai nahiin zindaa huun threedots  honthon ke paas aae hansii kyaa mazaal hai dil kaa muaamalaa hai koii dillagii nahiin zindaa huun threedots  ye chaand ye havaa ye fizaa sab hain maadmaa jo tuu nahiin to in men koii dilakashii nahiin zindaa huun threedots

Title: mere bachapan ke saathii mujhe bhuul na jaanaa
Lyrics: mere bachapan ke sathi mujhe bhuul na jaanaa  dekho dekho hanse na zamaanaa hanse na zamaanaa   gam furaqat ke sah na sakuungii  roungii kuchh kah na sakuungii  dushman hai saaraa jahaan jaaun kahaan teri ulfat hai jiine kaa bas ik bahaanaa  dekho dekho hanse na zamaanaa hanse na zamaanaa  raat guzaaruun gin gin taare  kaise aaun paas tumhaare  tum ho kahiin main kahiin chain nahiin  haaye duniya ne dil kaa mere gam na jaanaa  dekho dekho hanse na zamaanaa hanse na zamaanaa  koi dil kaa dard na jaane  apane bhi ab hai begaane  ro ro ke kahataa hai dil aa saajan mil  bas itanaa hii sun le meraa hai fasaanaa  dekho dekho hanse na zamaanaa hanse na zamaanaa

Title: yaad karoge yaad karoge ik din ham ko yaad karoge
Lyrics: yaad karoge threedots yaad karoge yaad karoge ik din ham ko yaad karoge tadapoge fariyaad karoge ik din ham ko yaad karoge  aayengii jab saawan kii raaten jaag uthengii bhuulii baaten dard se dil aabaad karoge ik din ham ko yaad karoge  jise basaayaa thaa kabhii man men dhuundhoge dhuundhoge use baag men ban men dhuundhoge  threedots dil kaa sukuun barabaad karoge ik din ham ko yaad karoge  dil men basaa ke chhod diyaa hai apanaa hii ghar barabaad kiyaa hai kaise use aabaad karoge ik din ham ko yaad karoge  kho kar ham ko paa na sakoge honge jahaan ham aa na sakoge aa na sakoge paa na sakoge tadapoge tadapoge fariyaad karoge  yaad karoge yaad karoge threedots

Lyrics: lmore raaja ho more raaja ho le chal nadiyaa ke paar2 rmorii raanii ho tumhii morii praan adhaar2  tuu ne aisaa jaaduu daalaa bik gaii tere haath2 janam janam tak sang rahuungii janam janam tak sang rahuungii kabhii na choduun saath more raaja ho ham ko tujhe ho na bisaar rmorii raanii ho tumhii morii praan adhaar lmore raajaa ho le chal nadiyaa ke paar rmorii raanii ho tumhii morii praan adhaar  lpyaar kii miithii baaton men saajanavaa main gaii haar2 rpyaarii terii aankhon men main pyaarii terii aankhon men main bhuul gayaa sanasaar merii aankhon men jhukii hai suratiyaa tuhaar lmerii saanson men guunje naam tohaar more raajaa ho le chal nadiyaa ke paar rmorii raanii ho tumhii morii praan adhaar  lmain to priit nibhaauun balamaa tum bhii priit nibhaanaa2 rsaath saath hii ham tum dono saath saath hii ham tum donon gaayen mast taraana lmore raajaa ho le chal nadiyaa ke paar rmorii raanii ho tumhii morii praan adhaar

Title: ab yaad na kar bhuul jaa ai dil vo fasaanaa
Lyrics: mu ab yaad na kar bhuul jaa ai dil vo fasaanaa     vo pyaar kii ghadiyaan vo muhabbat kaa zamaanaa       kyon yaad tujhe aate hain biitii huii baaten     tuu bhuul jaa tuu bhuul jaa     vo pyaar ke din pyaar kii raaten     ab tuut chukaa hai vo teraa kvaab suhaanaa     vo pyaar kii ghadiyaan vo muhabbat kaa zamaanaa     ab yaad na kar threedots   la ai jhuumatii laharaatii huii mast havaaon     ai pyaare nazaaron rangiin fizaaon     o jaake unhen aaj meraa haal sunaao     kah do ke meraa dil hai tumhaaraa hii divaanaa     hai pyaar kii ghadiyaan hai muhabbat ka zamaanaa   mu aatiin hain mere kaan men ye kisakii sadaayen la tum dil se kud hii puchh lo ham kyon ye bataaen mu yaad aane lagaa yaad aane lagaa yaad aane lagaa     phir mujhe vo bhuulaa fasaanaa     ai pyaar kii ghadiyaan ai muhabbat kaa zamaanaa   la aa jaa ke ab is dard bhare dil ko bhuulaaen mu armaanon ke  gulashan men naye phuul khilaaen    ham tere hain dil teraa hai     ye bhuul na jaana ye bhuul na jaanaa  2

Title: bekabar jaag zaraa  kisakii aulaad hai tuu  mujhe din raat lagii
Lyrics: bekabar jaag zaraa bekabar jaag zaraa bekabar jaag zaraa bekabar jaag zaraa  kisakii aulaad hai tuu itanii kabar hai ke nahiin aaj bhii qadamon men tere ye jhukii jaae zamiin kyonke ye terii hai har zarraa hai isakaa teraa bekabar jaag zaraa threedots  bulbulen aaj bhhii baagon men yahii gaatii hain haae kayaa shaan thii nawabon kii duharaatii hain sun ke jo phuul khilaa jhuum ke ye kahane lagaa bekabar jaag zaraa threedots  raajpuuton kii shujaat kii kahaanii sun le kaun the tere bade merii zubaanii sun le unakii aulaad se mujh ko hai bas itanaa shikwaa bekabar jaag zaraa threedots  jang men mirzaa qaklandar ali khan kaa jaanaa qahar barasaanaa thaa dushaman pe qayaamat dhaanaa haae vo josh nawaabon kii ragon men naa rahaa bekabar jaag zaraa threedots  kaun rajpuut kaa jaayaa kabhii madahosh huaa jaag o uunche nishaan waale tuu behosh huaa ud gaii sone kii chidiyaa rahaa kaalii pinjraa bekabar jaag zaraa threedots  phuut aapas men padii ghar teraa barabaad huaa terii barbaadii pe dushaman teraa abaad huaa hosh kar ab to gale bhaaii ke bhaaii lag jaa bekabar jaag zaraa threedots  mujhe din raat lagii tere jagaane kii hai dhun maadarehind ke laadon pale kuchh merii bhii sun tezrafataar zamaane se qadam uth ke milaa bekabar jaag zaraa threedots  aaj har mulk ke soe hue bedaar hue tifl jo ghutanon ke bal chalate the hushyaar hue magar o niind ke matawaale tuu soyaa hi rahaa bekabar jaag zaraa threedots

Title: dhiire dhiire aa re baadal dhiire aa
Lyrics: dhiire dhiire aa re baadal dhiire aa re baadal dhiire dhiire jaa meraa bulabul so rahaa hai shorgul na machaa  raat dhundhalii ho gayii hai saarii duniyaa so gayii hai sahjalaa ke kah rahii hain phuul kyaarii men so gayii so gayii so gayii lailaa kisii ke intazaarii men merii lailaa ko o baadal tuu nazar na lagaa o baadal tuu nazar na lagaa meraa bulabul so rahaa hai shor gul na machaa dhiire dhiire  ta na naa ta na naa ta na na na naa ta na naa ta na na na naa  o gaane vaale dhiire gaanaa giit tuu apanaa kyon are tuut jaayegaa kisii kii aankh kaa sapanaa chupake chupake kah rahaa hai mujh se meraa dil aa gayii dekho musaafir pyaar kii manzil  kaun gaataa hai rubaaii re phir ye kis kii yaad aayii re kis ne pahanaa dii hai bolo kis ne pahanaa dii hai mujh ko prem kii maalaa kis ne merii zindagii kaa rang badal daalaa tum kahoge priit is ko tum kahoge pyaar main kahuun haan main kahuun do dil mile hain khil gayaa sansaar do dilon kii ye kahaanii tuu bhii sunataa jaa o baadal tuu bhii sunataa jaa

Title: kaalii ghataao jaao saajan ko samajhaao
Lyrics: kaalii ghataao jaao saajan ko samajhaao sajan ko samajhaao  ruuth gae hain baalam mose paapii jiyaraa moraa tadape bhuul bhaii hai kahuun main kaase pii ko manaa kar laao     sajan ko samajhaao threedots  sainyaan se jaa ke ro ro kahanaa maang hai ujadii  tuutaa gahanaa nisadin tarase daras ko nainaa ab naa mohe kalapaao     sajan ko samajhaao threedots  painyaa paduun main ruuth naa jaanaa jiyaraa moraa chhod naa jaanaa baalam mohe naa bhulaao aao     sajan ko samajhaao threedots

Title: nit nit ke ruuthanewaale saajan
Lyrics: ra nit nit ke ruuthanewaale saajan     tum diip bano main patang banuun he nahiin     tum diip bano main patang banuun do phir donon mil kar jal jaaen ra nit nit ke duhkh men sukh paaen  he main raakh banuun aur ud jaauun ra main pavan ruup me sang chaluun     nit nit ke ruuthanewaale saajan threedots  ra main kalii banuun aur khiluun nahiin he main bhanwaraa banuun aur miluun nahiin ra main khil kar tum par phuul banuun he main phuul kaa sundar rang banuun     nit nit ke ruuthanewaale saajan threedots

Lyrics: ho o o morii baalii umariyaa 2 sanwariyaa 2 dekho maaro na o dekho maaro na tirachhii najariyaa dekho maaro na tirachhii najariyaa najariyaa sanwariyaa 2 haay baalii umariyaa ho o o morii baalii umariyaa  tore nainan men jaaduu hai o bekabar ho tore nainan men jaaduu hai o bekabar yahii dar hai ke dil men naa kar jaaye ghar haan yahii dar hai ke dil men naa kar jaaye ghar rahe apanii naa mohe kabariyaa 2  o sanwariyaa dekho maaro na o dekho maaro na tirachhii najariyaa najariyaa sanwariyaa 2 haay baalii umariyaa ho morii baalii umariyaa   mile nainaa se nainaa jiyaa kho gayaa haay jiyaa kho gayaa  2 ye aankhon hii aankhon men kyaa ho gayaa ho gayaa jaane aankhon hii aankhon men kyaa ho gayaa more baankesajiile sanwariyaa 2  o sanwariyaa dekho maaro na o dekho maaro na tirachhii najariyaa najariyaa sanwariyaa 2 haay baalii umariyaa ho morii baalii umariyaa

Title: din guzaraa raat aaii re baalam dhadakan laagaa jii
Lyrics: din guzaraa raat aaii re baalam dhadakan laagaa jii meraa dhadakan laagaa jii merii ek naa maanii ai dil 2 ab gam ke aansuu pii ho jii dhadakan laagaa jii meraa dhadakan laagaa jii din guzaraa raat aaii  priit kii riit kahuun na jaane ho raam 2 jaane aag lagaanaa jaljal ke main raakh bhaii ab jaljal ke main raakh bhaii ek baar mil jaanaa ho raam ek baar mil jaanaa raam kare main marmar jaauun 2 tuu baalam mere jii ho jii dhadakan laagaa jii meraa dhadakan laagaa jii din guzaraa raat aaii  biit gaiin wo chain kii raaten 2 sukh ke wo din biit gaye 2 haar ke baithe gaye dil waale 2 dil ke dukh in biit gaye bhuul gayaa wo priit lagaa ke 2 main yaad karuun kisakii ho jii dhadakan laagaa jii meraa dhadakan laagaa jii din guzaraa raat aaii

Title: hamen chhod piyaa kis des gae
Lyrics: hamen chhod piyaa kis des gae piyaa laut ke aanaa bhuul gae murajhaa gaiin honthon kii kaliyaan ham hansanaa hansaanaa bhuul gae  so jatan se priit lagaaii thii ye duniyaa sog banaaii thii kyon priit lagaanaa yaad rahaa kyon priit nibhaanaa bhuul gae hamen chhod piyaa kis des gae threedots  rote rote barasaat gaii sundar sundar har raat gaii ujade hue is ghar men akasar ham diip jalaanaa bhuul gae hamen chhod piyaa kis des gae threedots  ham aankh se ojhal hote the tum sau sau aansuu rote the ham sau sau aansuu rote hain tum mukh dikhalanaa bhuul gae hamen chhod piyaa kis des gae threedots

Title: dil ho unhen mubaarak jo dil ko dhuundhate hain
Lyrics: dil ho unhen mubaarak jo dil ko dhuundhate hain 2 ham dil se haath dho kar qaatil ko dhuundhate hain 2  e maut aa ke tuu hii ab raastaa dikhaa de 2 dardar bhatakane vaale 2 manzil do dhuundhate hain 2 ham dil se haath threedots  jab mit rahii ho hastii kho jaae dil to kyaa gam 2 ulfat men mitane vaale sab dil ko dhuundhate hain 2  naadaan the kitane ham bhii duniyaa ke safar men khud hii dubo ke kashtii saahil ko dhuundhate hain ham dil se haath threedots

Title: vo apanii yaad dilaane ko
Lyrics: vo apanii yaad dilaane ko  ik ishq ki duniyaa chhod gaye jaladii men lipistik bhuul gaye  ruumaal puraanaa chhod gaye  aashiq jo hue the ham unapar dinraat lagaate the chakkar sab kuchh to bataayaa ham ne magar pit jaane kaa qissaa chhod gaye  daulat kaa hamen aramaan rahaa      is ishq men bhii nuqasaan rahaa do aane kaa bhii jo bik na sakaa  piital kaa vo bundaa chhod gae  mufalis the janaabemajanuun bhii  sunate hain jab unakii maut aaii paakit se na nikalii ik paaii laila kaa vo kuttaa chhod gaye  jiine se hain ham apane kafaa      aur marane se hai dar lagataa the mard jinhon ne zahar piyaa aaraam se duniyaa chhod gaye  talawaar dikhaa kar ham ne kahaa karatii ho hamen tum kyon rusavaa sun logii kisii din muraliidhar is ishq men duniyaa chhod gaye

Lyrics: niind hamaare kvaab tumhaare kitane miithe kaise pyaare laharon kii saharon kii kii godii men jaise aankh michaulii khele taare niind hamaare kvaab tumhaare threedots  man donon ke khil jaane do ik duuje se mil jaane do dekhate hain bechain bechaare nain tumhaare niir hamaare niind hamaare kvaab tumhaare threedots  nargis ko sharamaate hain vo jal men aag lagaate hain ye donon hain badanaam bechaare zakm hamaare tiir tumhaare niind hamaare kvaab tumhaare threedots

Lyrics: sab kuchh lutaayaa ham ne aa kar terii galii men ghar chhod kar banaayaa hai ghar terii galii men  maathe pe us ko rakh luun sajade men sar jhukaa duun mil jaae jo bhii ham ko patthar terii galii men  kanajar tane hue hain aur sar jhuke hue hain maqatil kaa kich rahaa hai manazar terii galii men  tere liye jiye hain tere liye maren ge ye soch kar banaayaa hai ghar terii galii men

Title: chane zor garam baabuu main laayaa mazedaar
Lyrics: chane zor garam baabuu main laayaa mazedaar chane zor garam  2  mere chane hain chatapate bhaiyaa aur bade laasaanii aur kaise chaav se khaate dekho raam aur ramajaanii aur chunnuu munnuu kii jabaan bhii ho gaii paaniipaanii aur kahen kabiir suno bhaii saadho chhunak guruu kii baanii   chane zor garam baabuu main laayaa mazedaar chane zor garam  2  are madarase kaa jiivan to chand dinon kaa thaath aur padhlikh kar sab chal doge tum apaniiapanii baat phir koii tum men hogaa afasar koii gavarnar laat tab main aauungaa daftar tumare main aauungaa daftar tumare liye chane kii chaat   chane zor garam baabuu main laayaa mazedaar chane zor garam  2   chane zor garam baabuu main laayaa mazedaar chane zor garam  meraa chanaa banaa hai aalaa jisamen daalaa garammasaalaa chakhate jaanaa jii tum laalaa aisaa huun main dilliiwaalaa inakaa swaad hai badaa niraalaa  chane zor garam baabuu main laayaa mazedaar chane zor garam  aaii chane kii bahaar khaate jaanaa tum sarakaar mere chane jaayakedaar agar tumako na hoy etabaar to main bhii kahataa huun lalakaar  chane zor garam baabuu main laayaa mazedaar chane zor garam  dekh lo meraa ye darabaar jahaan par khade silasilewaar riyaasat bhar ke sab saradaar ek se ek sabhii husiyaar  kids koras 	ek se ek sabhii husiyaar  ye dekho mere suubedaar ye dekho meraa tahasiladaar yahii hain mere thaanedaar  kids koras 	ek se ek sabhii husiyaar  aur ye bade sipahasalaar baanarsenaa ke saradaar   chane zor garam baabuu main laayaa mazedaar chane zor garam  2

Title: uthaaye jaa unake sitam aur jiye jaa
Lyrics: uthaaye jaa un ke sitam aur jiye jaa  yuun hii muskuraae jaa aansuu piye jaa     2 uthaae jaa un ke siitam threedots  yahii hai muhabbat kaa dastuur ai dil dastuur ai dil vo gam de tujhe tuu duaaen diye jaa uthaaye jaa un ke sitam threedots  kabhii vo nazar jo samaai thii dil men samaai thii dil men usii ek nazar kaa sahaaraa liye jaa uthaae jaa un ke sitam threedots  sataae zamaanaa yaa sitam dhaaye duniyaa sitam dhaaye duniyaa magar tuu kisii kii tamannaa kiye jaa uthaaye jaa un ke sitam aur jiye jaa yuun hii muskuraae jaa aansuu piye jaa uthaaye jaa un ke sitam threedots

Title: kuchh phuul khile aramaanon ke
Lyrics: kuchh phuul khile aramaanon ke par jii bhar ke musakaa na sake  2 dil roro kuun huaa phir bhii 2 aankhon men aansuu aa na sake kuchh phuul khile aramaanon ke   jaane ye bandhan kab chhuute dukh kii zanjiiren kab tuuten  2 dekho qisamat kii majabuurii 2 wo aa na sake ham jaa na sake dekho qisamat kii majabuurii  o meraa ujadaa hai gulashan khil ke haay bichhade hain do dil mil ke 2 wo hamako paa kar kho baithe 2 ham unako kho kar paa na sake  kuchh phuul khile aramaanon ke par jii bhar ke musakaa na sake kuchh phuul khile aramaanon ke

Title: dil se bhulaa do tum hamen ham naa tumhen bhulaaenge
Lyrics: dil se bhulaa do tum hamen ham naa tumhen bhulaaenge ruuth ke jaanewaale ham duniyaa se ruuth jaaenge ham naa tumhen bhulaaenge  nazaron se kyuun giraa diyaa tum ne kisii gariib ko kaise manaaegaa koii ruuthe hue nasiib ko tum ne die jo dil ko daag kaise unhen chhupaaenge ruuth ke jaanewaale threedots  tum ne hamen mitaa diyaa tum se kahen to kyaa kahen maanaa ke bewafaa ho tum phir bhii na bewafaa kahen tum ne jo kahanaa thaa kah chuke ham yahii kahate jaaenge ruuth ke jaanewaale threedots

Title: gariibon par jo hotii hain  gam kaa fasaanaa kisako sunaaen
Lyrics: gariibon par jo hotii hain jafaaen kaun sunataa hai zamaane  men dukhe dil kii sadaaen  kaun sunataa hai   gam kaa fasaanaa kisako sunaaen tuutaa huaa dil kaise dikhaaen  teraa bhalaa ho tadapaane vaale dil de rahaa hai tujhako duaaen gam kaa fasaanaa threedots  hansatii hai qisamat kahatii hai duniyaa aapas men do dil milane naa paaen gam kaa fasaanaa threedots  tujhako qasam hai aise me aa jaa phir ye zamaane shaayad naa aaen gam kaa fasaanaa threedots

Lyrics: tum jugjug jiyo jahaan men maan ke jaaye bhagawaan umariyaa merii tumhen lagaaye  2  aankhon se ojhal ho gaye chaand hamaare 2 nitnit sapane aayenge hamen tihaare birahan maan ke dil se nikalegii haay  bhagawaan umariyaa merii tumhen lagaaye tum jugjug jiyo jahaan men maan ke jaaye bhagawaan umariyaa merii tumhen lagaaye  mere janamjanam ke sukh tumako mil jaayen 2 jit jaao sab den tumako yahii duaaen ye phuul sadaa phuulen kabhii na murajhaayen  bhagawaan umariyaa merii tumhen lagaaye tum jugjug jiyo jahaan men maan ke jaaye bhagawaan umariyaa merii tumhen lagaaye

Lyrics: aankhon men aa jaa dil men samaa jaa merii kahaanii sun jaa apanii sunaa jaa 2 aankhon men aa jaa dil men samaa jaa  bigadii hai qismat jiiwan hai phiikaa jiiwan hai phiikaa aa tujhase kah duun dukh apane jii kaa 2 o dam bhar ko aa ke merii bigadii banaa jaa  aankhon men aa jaa dil men samaa jaa merii kahaanii sun jaa apanii sunaa jaa aankhon men aa jaa dil men samaa jaa  is dil ko duniyaa tadapaa rahii hai tadapaa rahii hai aise men terii yaad aa rahii hai 2 o aa aur aa ke mujhe gam se chhudaa jaa  aankhon men aa jaa dil men samaa jaa merii kahaanii sun jaa apanii sunaa jaa aankhon men aa jaa dil men samaa jaa  chhode naa duniyaa diiwaanaa kar ke diiwaanaa kar ke jiinaa bhii koii jiinaa hai mar ke 2 o haay main kaise jiyuun ye to bataa jaa  aankhon men aa jaa dil men samaa jaa merii kahaanii sun jaa apanii sunaa jaa aankhon men aa jaa dil men samaa jaa

Title: teraa jahaan aabaad hai meraa jahaan barabaad hai
Lyrics: teraa jahaan aabaad hai meraa jahaan barabaad hai fariyaad hai fariyaad hai ai aasamaan fariyaad hai teraa jahaan aabaad hai meraa jahaan barabaad hai  tuu kush ke tere baag ke sab phuul aakir khil gaye jin kii tamannaa thii tujhe aakir wo tujhako mil gaye mere muqaddar men faqat gam aur kisii kii yaad hai  teraa jahaan aabaad hai meraa jahaan barabaad hai  tuu kush ke tere haath men ummiid kaa jaam aa gayaa merii muhabbat ke liye rone kaa paigaam aa gayaa  hairat naa kar ai bekabar duniyaa hai ek jaaduu kaa ghar do dil hain ek ghar men magar ek shaad ek naashaad hai  fariyaad hai fariyaad hai ai aasamaan fariyaad hai teraa jahaan

Title: bhaarat kii ek sannaarii kii ham kathaa sunaate hain
Lyrics: bhaarat kii ek sannaarii kii ham kathaa sunaate hain 2 mithalaa kii raajadulaarii kii ham vyathaa sunaate hain 2 bhaarat kii ek sannaarii kii ham kathaa sunaate hain 2  shivadhanush raam ne todaa 2 milaa chandrachakor kaa jodaa 2  janakapurii se todaa naataa avadhapurii se jodaa  2 komal thii wo kalii sukhon men palii wanon men chalii bahot dukh paaii sun kar usakii vyathaa nain bhar aate hain ham kathaa sunaate hain 2 bhaarat kii ek sannaarii kii ham kathaa sunaate hain 2  raawan ne chhal karii siyaa ko harii vidhii kyaa karii jo thaa ban paaii   siitaasiitaa karen birah men jaren banon men phiren vikal raghuraaii 2    pawanaputra vahaan aaye 2 sudhi ko dhaaye yukti bahu kiinhiin siyaa sudhi paaii raam kop kar badhe lank par chadhe phuunk dai lank siyaa laut aaii 3   jaise diye men tel tel men baat baat men tej prakaase tase raam hriday men siyaa siyaa hiye raamaii baase kyaa binaa praan ke amar dahii kahiin dehii  kyaa yahii raam darabaar kahaan vaidehii 2

Lyrics: jab usane gesuu bikharaaye baadal aayaa jhuum ke mast umangen laharaaii hain rangiin mukhadaa chuum ke  gunchaa mahakaa bulabul chahakaa 2 naache bhanwaraa ghuum ke  jab usane gesuu bikharaaye baadal aayaa jhuum ke  usake nain gulaabii 2 kar den sabako sharaabii 2  baadal aayaa jhuum ke jab usane gesuu bikharaaye baadal aayaa jhuum ke   jab hanshans kar wo bole kaanon men wo ras ghole har dil men aramaan dole ishq apanii aankhen khole  2  o  usane paimaanaa chhalakaayaa aa saaqii mastii men aanchal dhalakaayaa aa saaqii  2 room jhum rum jhum  baadal aayaa jhuum ke jab usane gesuu bikharaaye baadal aayaa jhuum ke mast umangen laharaaii hain rangiin mukhadaa chuum ke

Title: lo shuru huii is baar ham men tum men taqaraar
Lyrics: be  lo shuru huii is baar      ham men tum men taqaraar      ab mere dil kaa daag ho tum      kuchh nahiin gale kaa haar          sunate ho  a   achchhaa main tere dil kaa daag sahii      par daag huun pyaaraa pyaaraa      bin daag na degaa chaand kabhii      thandaa miithaa ujiyaaraa      kaantaa na lagaa ho phuul ke saath      to phuul hai bilakul kaar be  kyaa isii tarah kii hogii shuru      ham men tum men taqaraar  be  ham tum men hameshaa tanii rahegii      kabhii na hogaa mel      bhuule to na honge abhii tumhen      wo baalakapan ke khel      is baar magar kuchh aisii thanegii      laakh banaae nahiin banegii      mil kar bhii rahenge alagalag      jaise paanii aur tel a   main jaake kahiin chhup jaauungaa      aur piihuu piihuu kii bol ke bolii      dil men dard uthaauungaa be  main dil kaa dard mitaane      aur man kaa miit manaane      jhat in charanon men aana giruungii      kar ke prem pukaar a   kyaa isii tarah kii hogii shuru      ham tum men taqaraar

Title: jhuum jhuum ke naacho aaj gaao aaj gaao khushii ke giit ho
Lyrics: jhuum jhuum ke naacho aaj gaao aaj gaao khushii ke giit ho gaao khushii ke giit aaj kisii kii haar hui hai aaj kisii kii jiit ho gaao khushii ke giit jhuum jhuum ke threedots  koii kisii kisii kii aankh kaa taaraa jiivan saathii saajan pyaaraa aur koii taqadiir kaa maaraa dhuundh rahaa hai dil kaa sahaaraa kisii ko dil kaa dard milaa hai kisii ko man kaa miit ho gaao khushii ke giit jhuum jhuum ke threedots  dekho to kitanaa khush hai zamaanaa dil men tarange lab pe taraanaa band aankh aansuu na bahaanaa ye to yahaan kaa dhang puraanaa isako mitaanaa usako banaanaa is nagarii kii riit ho gaao khushii ke giit jhuum jhuum ke threedots

Title: zindagii hai pyaar se pyaar men bitaaye jaa
Lyrics: zindagii hai pyaar se pyaar men bitaaye jaa husn ke huzuur pe apanaa dil lutaaye jaa apanaa sar jhukaaye jaa  zindagii hai ek raat pyaar us men hai chiraag ye chiraag jitanii der jal sake jalaaye jaa raushanii lutaaye jaa  zindagii hai ek baag pyaar is men hai bahaar us men aankh kaa kumaar daal kar milaaye jaa shauq se pilaaye jaa  zindagii hai ek juaa duur se dekhataa hai kyaa aage badh kar apanii jaan daav par lagaaye jaa hansake maat khaaye jaa  zindagii junuun hai junuun se nibhaaye jaa tu apane azm ko kudaaezindagii banaaye jaa aasmaan pe chhaaye jaa  husn hai shabaab hai vaqt laajavaab hai main bhii chehachahaa uthuun tuu bhii chehachahaaye jaa bansarii bajaaye jaa

Title: diinadayaal sakal dukh bhanjan  prabhu ke darshan paaye mainne

Lyrics: ai chaand tuu bataa de mere dil ko kayaa huaa hai ae chaand tuu bataa de  jaise hain daag tere vaise hain daag mere aapas men milataa julataa donon kaa maajaraa hai ae chaand tuu bataa de mere dil ko kayaa huaa hai ae chaand tuu bataa de  kayaa raat hai suhaanii taare bhii so rahe hain ik gam hain dardedil ke betaab ho rahe hain ye kaun saa maraz hai aur is kii kyaa davaa hai ae chaand tuu bataa de  mere dilojigar men shole bhadak rahe hain aur vo vahiin pe baithe paanii chhidak rahe hain ye kaise rozeulafat kuchh bujh ke jal rahaa hai ae chaand tuu bataa de mere dil ko kayaa huaa hai ae chaand tuu bataa de

Title: haath siine pe jo rakh do to qaraar aa jaae
Lyrics: g haath siine pe jo rakh do to qaraar aa jaae 2    dil ke ujade hue gulshan men bahaar aa jaae 2  n dil to kahataa hai ki aankhon men chhupaa luun tujhako 2    dar yahii hai ki muqaddar ko nakaar aa jaae 2 g haath siine pe jo rakh do to qaraar aa jaae  g dil ke zakhmon pe mere pyaar kaa marhham rakh do 2    beqaraarii to mujhe kuchh to qaraar aa jaae 2    haath siine pe jo rakh do to qaraar aa jaae  n yuun kudaa ke lie chhiino na mere hoshohavaas 2    aisii nazaron se na dekho ki kumaar aa jaae g haath siine pe jo rakh do to qaraar aa jaae  g chhod ke tum bhii chale jaaogii qismat kii tarah 2    baadazaane to ajal hii ko na pyaar aa jaae 2     haath siine pe jo rakh do to qaraar aa jaae    dil ke ujade hue gulshan men bahaar aa jaae

Title: suno suno ai duniyaa vaalon baapuu kii ye amar kahaanii
Lyrics: suno suno ai duniyaa vaalon baapuu kii ye amar kahaanii vah baapuu jo puujya hai itanaa jitanaa gngaa maan kaa paanii porbandar gujaraat desh men ek rrishhii ne janm liya  1 bachapan khel kuud men gujaraa landan jaakar vidyaa paaii bairistar ban afriikaa men jaakar apanii dhaak jamaaii lekin jo praanii duniyaa men amar kahaane aate hai vo kab maayaa moha men phas kar apanaa samay mangavaate hai suno suno threedots  2 afriikaa men hindii jan kii badii durdashaa paaii gore raaj se takkar lekar satya kii jyotii jalaaii phir bhaarat kii sevaa karane apane desh men aayaa saabaramatii men satyaagrah kaa aashram aan banaayaa aur khilaafat kaanfrens men sabhaapati kaa darjaa paayaa islaamii adhikaar kii rakshaa men bhii haath bataayaa hinduu muslim donon usakii aankhon ke taare the duniyaa ke saare hii mazahab baapuu ko pyaare the suno suno threedots  3 bhaarat kaumii kaangres kii aisii dhuuma machaaii kaumii jhande ke niiche phir janataa daudii aaii khaadii kaa prachaar kiyaa phir ghar ghar khaadii aaii aur videshii maal kii holii gaandhii ne jalavaayii charakh kii aavaaz jo guunjii huii mashiinen thandii aur shaan se laharaaii bhaarat kii tirangii jhandii  4 phir puurna svaraajya kaa naaraa jaa laahora pukaaraa aazaadii kaa viir sipaahii kabhii na himmat haaraa phir daandii par jaa kar aapane haatho namak banaayaa saur desh ko styagrah kaa sundar sabak padhaayaa bhaaraatavaasii japate the phir gaandhii naam kii maalaa chaaliis karod dilon pe chhaayaa ek langotii vaalaa suno suno threedots  5 sachchaaii kaa atal pujaarii jisane kabhii na himmat haarii sarakaarii kaanuun tod kar duniyaa ke aaraam chhod kar desh ke khaatir jel gayaa aur apane sukh par khel gayaa suno suno threedots  6 harijanon kaa maan badhaane kii khaatir vrata rakhaa gaandhii ne duniyaa ke aage eka nayaa mat rakhaa gaanv gaanv men harijaanon kii haalat dekhii bhaalii haarijan naam se hari sevak ne ik akhabaar nikaalii kaangresa kii baagadora phir viir javaahar ko de kar shuruu kiyaa baapuu ne aapanaa graam sudhaar kaa chakkar suno suno threedots  7 ek naii aavaaz jo aaii shuruu huii ek naii ladaaii guunjaa phir baapuu kaa naaraa chhodo hindustaan hamaaraa phira aaii ik jel yaatraa jelon se kab darataa thaa vo aazaadii kaa paravaanaa thaa aazaadii para marataa thaa vo suno suno threedots  8 jel ke andar honii ne phir apanaa tiir chalaayaa baapuu jii kii ardhdaanganii ko ant samay bulaavaa aayaa jel ke andar khaamoshii se devii kii chitaa jalaaii janataa aapanii maan ke antim darshan bhii karane naa paaii suno suno threedots  9 hinduu muslim ke siino men phira bhadakii nafarat kii jvaalaa jis ko dekh kar dukhii huvaa kuraan aur giitaa kaa matavaalaa navaakhalii men khuun kii holii haivaanon ne khelii dayaa kii muurat baapuu se ye piidaa gaii na jhelii tan pe langotii haath me dandaa honthon pe thii prem kii baanii nagarnagar paidal phirataa thaa assii saal kaa buudhaa praanii san saintaaliis pandrah agast ko aazaadii kaa din jab aayaa apane desh men apanaa jhandaa dhuumdhaam se laharaayaa lekin us din pyaaraa baapuu bhaarat kaa ujiyaalaa baapuu duur dillii se navaakhalii men kamazorii kii rakhavaalii men apanii jaan ladaaye thaa aur apanaa aap chhupaae thaa suno suno threedots  10 kalakatte se dillii aa kar us nagarii kaa maan badhaayaa saanjha savere raam naam kaa biralaa ghaar men diyaa jalaayaa raghupati raaghava raajaa raam iishvar allaah tere nam baapuu kaa aadhaar yahii thaa baapuu kaa prachaar yahii thaa suno suno threedots  11 tiisa janavarii shaam ko baapuu biralaa ghar se baahar aaye praarthanaa sthaan kii jaanib dhiiredhiire kadam badhaaye lekin us din honii apanaa ruup badal kar aaii aur ahinsaa ke siine par hinsaa ne golii barasaaii baapuu ne kahaa raamraam aur jag se kiyaa kinaaraa raam ke mandir men jaa pahunchaa shriiraam kaa pyaaraa jaao baapuu jaao baapuu rahegaa naam tumhaaraa baapuu tum ne praan diyaa aur maut kii shaan badhaaii tum ne aapanaa khuun diyaa aur prem kii jyoti jalaaii jay baapuu kii jaya gaandhii kii bolo sab jan jay gaandhii jis ne hinduu muslim men ik dor pyaar kii baandhii yaad rahe baapuu kii kahaanii bhuul na isako jaae ham baapuu ne jo diyaa jalaayaa usakii jyoti badhaaen ham jay baapuu kii jay gaandhii kii bolo sab jan jay gaandhii jay gaandhii jay gaandhii jay gaandhii jay gaandhii suno suno threedots

Lyrics: ik bewafaa kii yaad ne tadapaa ke maar daalaa haay tadapaa ke maar daalaa  2 ik bewafaa kii yaad ne   paimaanaa zindagii kaa merii gam se bhar diyaa  2 ai dil teraa buraa ho ye kyaa tuune kar diyaa mujhako mere nasiib se takaraa ke maar daalaa  haay tadapaa ke maar daalaa ik bewafaa kii yaad ne tadapaa ke maar daalaa haay tadapaa ke maar daalaa ik bewafaa kii yaad ne   badanaam haay muft men qisamat kaa naam thaa  2 jo kuchh kiyaa hai tumane tumhaaraa hii kaam thaa pahale to aaye saamane phir jaa ke maar daalaa  haay tadapaa ke maar daalaa ik bewafaa kii yaad ne tadapaa ke maar daalaa haay tadapaa ke maar daalaa ik bewafaa kii yaad ne  sochaa thaa ghar basaayenge apanaa kushiikushii sukhchain se biitaayenge do din kii zindagii hamako isii kayaal ne bahakaa ke maar daalaa  haay tadapaa ke maar daalaa ik bewafaa kii yaad ne tadapaa ke maar daalaa haay tadapaa ke maar daalaa ik bewafaa kii yaad ne

Lyrics: chaahate ho gar bhalaaii aashiqo dil luteron ko lutaanaa chhod do shaadii kar lo zindagii aaraam se kat jaaye 2 aankhen ladaanaa chhod do haan chhod do haan chhod do  machalane waale machalate jaayenge are husn ke saanche men dhalate jaayenge pyaar karanaa aaj kal hai dillagii dekh kar aramaan jalate jaayenge bewafaaii kaa garam baazaar hai 2 ab ishq kii dhajjii udaanaa chhod do haan chhod do haan chhod do  shaadii kar lo zindagii aaraam se kat jaaye aankhen ladaanaa chhod do haan chhod do haan chhod do  haan milate hain hansate bade andaaz se are baat karate jhuumate hain naaz se jo kahiin lattuu bane barabaad ho are duur rahanaa qasam khaa lo aaj se musakaraayen gar tumhen wo dekh kar 2 tum muskuraanaa chhod do haan chhod do haan chhod do  shaadii kar lo zindagii aaraam se kat jaaye aankhen ladaanaa chhod do haan chhod do haan chhod do  thaam kar dil aah bharanaa chhod do are unakii galiyon se guzaranaa chhod do wo balaa se tumape marate hon maren magar tum parawaah karanaa chhod do dekhanaa gar chaahate ho dekh le 2 par piichhe jaanaa chhod do  haan chhod do haan chhod do  shaadii kar lo zindagii aaraam se kat jaaye aankhen ladaanaa chhod do haan chhod do haan chhod do shaadii kar lo zindagii aaraam se kat jaaye

Lyrics: danke kii chot par kahataa huun main sunate jaao jii laalaa sachche kaa hai bolabaalaa jagat men jhuuthe kaa hai muunh kaalaa  badii badii diinge jo haank rahe the unake hothon pe lag gayaa taalaa kal tak diiwaalii manaate the jo dekho nikalaa hai unakaa diwaalaa ajii sachche kaa hai bolabaalaa threedots  chhip chhip ke chhuriyaan chalaane waalo kab tak manaaoge khair iishwar kii duniyaa men der hai bhaiyaa lekin nahiin andher dusaron ke liye mat khodo kuwaa kisii kaa bhii isase bhalaa naa huaa are ham sab ke upar jo maalik khadaa hai wo hai hazaar haathawaalaa ajii sachche kaa hai bolabaalaa threedots  jiit naa sakegaa koii ab hamase baazii miyaan biibii raajii to kyaa karegaa kaazii chullu bhar paanii men duub maro bhaiyaa kahataa hai ye gaadiiwaalaa chhote chhote baadalo tum kyaa chhupaaoge chandaa kaa ujiyaalaa ajii sachche kaa hai bolabaalaa threedots

Lyrics: baabul kaa ghar chhod ke gorii ho gaii aaj paraaii re dolii dekh jiyaaraa dole aankh niir bhar aaii re   nyaarii jag kii riit rii sakhiyaan kaun kisii kaa miit rii sakhiyaan  2 jhuuthii sabakii  kisane priit nibhaaii re  baabul kaa ghar chhod ke gorii ho gaii aaj paraaii re dolii dekh jiyaaraa dole aankh niir bhar aaii re  jin galiyon men bachapan biitaa kholii aankh jawaanii ne un galiyon se kiyaa kinaaraa sakhiyon kii pataraanii ne bhaiiyaa kaa man bharbhar aaye rot chalii maa jaaii re  baabul kaa ghar chhod ke gorii ho gaii aaj paraaii re dolii dekh jiyaaraa dole aankh niir bhar aaii re  pii ke pyaar men kho kar gorii hamako bhuul naa jaanaa roz nahiin to kabhiikabhii do akshar likh bhijawaanaa dhiiredhiire madhur suron men yahii kahe shahanaaii re   baabul kaa ghar chhod ke gorii ho gaii aaj paraaii re dolii dekh jiyaaraa dole aankh niir bhar aaii re  2

Lyrics: tum nahin aate ho nahin aao yaad se kah do vo bhii na aae bhuulane vaale bhuul gae jab yaad kuun unakii aa ke sataae  laakhon hii aramaan aankhon men aae paanii banaa ke maine bahaae aur jo dil men tadapate rahe vo kaleje men dard banaa ke chhipaae tum nahin aate threedots  mast havaa ab aae na aae kaalii ghataa ab chhaae na chhaae merii balaa se yaad men pii kii koyal malhaar gaae na gaae tum nahin aate threedots

Lyrics: chandaa kii chaandanii men haay raamaa haay re raamaa jiyaa meraa dol gayaa 2 koii kaanon men ras ke bhare bol 2 bol gayaa haay raamaa haay re raamaa jiyaa meraa dol gayaa 2  dagaa na denaa 2 ajii ho rasiyaa kisii kii haay na lenaa dagaa na denaa koii ye na kahe ras kaa lobhii matalab ke bol bol gayaa haay raamaa haay re raamaa jiyaa meraa dol gayaa 2  chandaa kii chaandanii men haay raamaa haay re raamaa jiyaa meraa dol gayaa 2  neh lagaanaa sahal hai nibhaanaa badaa mushkil 2 bade naazon se paalaa hai tuut na jaaye meraa dil kahiin kahatii na rah jaauun sakhii karejawaa pe haan jiyaa anamol gayaa haay raamaa haay re raamaa jiyaa meraa dol gayaa 2  chandaa kii chaandanii men haay raamaa haay re raamaa jiyaa meraa dol gayaa 2
