Lyrics: nain hiin ko raah dikhaa prabhuu 2 pagpag thokar khaauun main nain hiin ko raah dikhaa prabhuu pagpag thokar khaauun main nain hiin ko  tumharii nagariyaa kii kathin dagariyaa 2 chalat chalat gir jaauun main prabhuu nain hiin ko raah dikhaa prabhuu pagpag thokar khaauun main nain hiin ko raah dikhaa prabhuu  chahuun or mere ghor andheraa bhuul naa jaauun dvaar teraa 2 ek baar prabhuu haath pakad lo 3 man kaa diip jalaauun main prabhuu  nain hiin ko raah dikhaa prabhuu pagpag thokar khaauun main nain hiin ko

Title: gaae jaa giit milan ke tuu apanii lagan ke sajan ghar jaanaa hai
Lyrics: gaae jaa giit milan ke tuu apane lagan ke sajan ghar jaanaa hai  kaahe chhalake nainon kii gagarii kaahe barase jal tum bin suunii saajan kii nagarii paradesiyaa ghar chal pyaase hain diip nayan ke tere darshan ke sajan gharthreedots  lut na jaae jiivan kaa dheraa mujhako hai ye gam ham akele ye jag luteraa bichhaden na milake ham bigade nasiib na banake ye din jiivan ke sajan gharthreedots  dole nayanaa priitam ke dvaare milane kii ye dhun baalam teraa tujhako pukaare yaad aanevaale sun saathii milenge bachapan ke khilenge phuul man ke sajan gharthreedots

Title: zindagii hai yaa kisii kaa intazaar
Lyrics: zindagii hai yaa kisii kaa intazaar badaliyon ke odhanii se chaandanii jaane kis ko jhaankatii hai baar baar  chaand taaron ko hai niind sii aa gayii har nazaare pe ik bekudii chhaa gayii mast ho ke jhuumatii huii bahaar jaane kis ko jhaankatii hai baar baar zindagii hai yaa threedots  katm hotii nahiin shauk kii justajuu o a a apane dil men liye pyaar kii aarazuu kuubakuu gaiin havaaen mushkabaar jaane kis ko jhaankatii hai baar baar zindagii hai yaa threedots  dil kii betaabiyaan le rahii hain mazaa ai merii zindagii aa bhii jaa aa bhii jaa har nazar hai aaj kitanii beqaraar jaane kis ko jhaankatii hai baar baar zindagii hai yaa threedots

Title: piyaamilan ko jaane waalii sambhalsambhal kar chal
Lyrics: piyaamilan ko jaane waalii sambhalsambhal kar chal  2 sambhalsambhal 4 piyaamilan ko jaane waalii sambhalsambhal kar chal  ghuungat khol kalii samajhaatii priit nagariyaa duur teraa saanwariyaa bulaa rahaa hai  kahaankahaan phir duur duur nahiin duur nahiin ab tere piyaa kaa sundar rangmahal sambhalsambhal 4 piyaamilan ko jaane waalii sambhalsambhal kar chal  aandhii aaii aandhii aaii kyaa ghabaraanaa tujhako des piyaa ke jaanaa naa dar naa dar in kaanton pe badhatii chal dekh ke baadal nahiin machal  nahiin hotaa yuun man bekal haath men mehandii lagii lagaayaa nainon men kaajal sambhalsambhal 4 piyaamilan ko jaane waalii sambhalsambhal kar chal  uthii ghataa ghanaghor teraa naach uthaa manmor 2 priitam aaye aaj milan kaa aayaa hai tyohaar  sajaa aaratii kiratan gaa aur pahanaa de tuu haar  2 aaii thii khil gayaa salonii teraa hiraday kamal ab sang piyaa ke chal sambhalsambhal 4 piyaamilan ko jaane waalii sambhalsambhal kar chal

Title: bahaaren phir bhii aayengii
Lyrics: nazar se duur jaanevaale dil se duur na karanaa merii aankhon ko rone par kahiin majabuur na karanaa   bahaaren phir bhii aayengii magar ham tum judaa honge ghataaen phir bhii chaayengii magar ham tum judaa honge bahaaren  jahaan chhup chhup ke ham milate2 the saajan vo galii hamako ishaaron se bulaayegii magar ham tum judaa honge bahaarenthreedots   sandesaa pyaar kaa laayengii saavan kii javaan raaten pavan jhuumegii gaayegii magar ham tum judaa honge bahaaren phir bhii aayengii magar ham tum judaa honge bahaaren  jahaan chhup chhup ke ham milate the saajan vo galii hamako ishaaron se bulaayegii magar ham tum judaa honge bahaarenthreedots

Title: suury dev jagadiip tej jinakaa jag saaje
Lyrics: suury dev jagadiip tej jinakaa jag saaje saat ashv ke rath par saarathii arun viraaje  tum unake kuladiip raam gharghar jay gaaje guunj uthe dash diish kiirti kaa dankaa baaje  daanaviir harishchandr nripati saty sevaa vritadhaarii putr naarii die bech saty par ban gae aap bhikhaarii  kathin tapasyaa bhagirath kii shrii gangaa jii ko laae go braahman pratipaal bhuupati diliip raaj kahaae  raghuraaj kii gauravgaathaa koii nahiin bisaraae ashvamedh kar aj ne jag men kiirti dhvaj pharakaae  dasharath jii ne deh tajaa par bachan nahiin taj paae tum ho unake praan jagat jinake nisdin gun gaae  suuryavansh kii vijaypataakaa tum phir se pharakaa do raamaraajy se bhaarat men tum sukhshaanti barasaa do

Title: baithii huun terii yaad kaa le kar ke sahaaraa
Lyrics: baithii huun terii yaad kaa lekar ke sahaaraa aa jaao ke chamake merii qismat kaa sitaaraa   din raat jalaa karatii huun furqat men tumhaarii har saans dhuaan banake nikalataa hai hamaaraa aa jaao ke chamake threedots   chup chaap sahe jaatii huun main dard kii choten le le ke jiye jaatii huun main naam tumhaaraa aa jaao ke chamake threedots   aksar merii aankhon ne tujhe niind men dhuundaa uth uth ke tujhe dil ne kaii baar pukaaraa aa jaao ke chamake threedots

Title: jiine kii suurat ho gaii  samajho ke mohabbat ho gaii
Lyrics: jiine kii suurat ho gaii aur terii badaulat ho gaii jab dard se chaahat ho gaii 2 samajho ke mohabbat ho gaii 2  jab haulehaule man dole aur apanii dhun men kuchh bole nainon men kaajal ras ghole samajho ke mohabbat threedots  jab ratiyaan naachen gaaen jab taare saaz bajaaen aur jhuumen mast ghataaen samajho ke mohabbat threedots  bevajah kalaaii jab chhanake chhanchhan chhanchhan paayal chhanake aur nayan kaa pyaalaa bhii khanake samajho ke mohabbat threedots

Title: kar liijiye chalakar mere jannat ke nazaare
Lyrics: kar liijiye chalakar mere jannat ke nazaare jannat yah banaayii hai muhabbat ke sahaare phuulon se liyaa rang sitaaron se ujaalaa har chiiz ko ik nuur ke dhaanche men hai dhaalaa  is kvaab kii bastii kaa falak hai na zamiin hai is husn kii duniyaa kii har ik chiiz hasiin hai roshan hai fizaa aur nahiin chaandsitaare jannat yah banaayii hai muhabbat ke sahaare  gaatii hai khushii nagame to hansataa hai vahaan gam kaliyon kii hansii dekh ke rotii nahiin shabanam fitarat kii zabaan par kahiin mastii kaa fasaanaa chheda hai khamoshii ne bhii puraqais taraanaa kuchh soye to kuchh jaage hue mast nazaare jannat ye banaayii hai muhabbat ke sahaare  athakheliyaan karatii huii chalatii hain havaaen nagamon kii hai barasaat to zulfon kii ghataayen rangiin huii aur bhii jannat kii kahaanii vah dekhiye 2 jhuule pe ruuhii kii javaanii betaab kiye dete hain maasuum ishaare maasuum ishaare

Title: unhen bhii raazeulfat kii na hone dii kabar main ne
Lyrics: unhen bhii raazeulfat kii naa hone dii kabar main ne nazar mil bhii gaii to kud bachaa lii hai nazar main ne  qadam jab main ne rakhaa raaheulfat men to duniyaa ne mujhe aavaaz dii lekin naa dekhaa chaunk kar main ne  bhalaa gairon se kyaa matalab jo main un se gila karataa shikaayat tum se kii hai tum ko apanaa jaan kar main ne  kahaan main aur kahaan dairoharam kii kashmakash nakshaab kisii ke naqshepaa par rakh diyaa jab aaj sar main ne

Title: ham the tumahare tum the hamaare
Lyrics: ham the tumahare tum the hamaare haae vo  bhii zamaanaa yaad karo  dil ko lagaa ke ham se aankhen churaa ke duur gae ho jab se aae na jaa ke chhupake jahaan par milte ham tum haae vo  bhii thikaanaa yaad karo ham the tumaharethreedots  khel nahiin hai koii dil kaa lagaanaa dekho vo  baaten kahiin bhuul na jaanaa tiir chale the nazaron ke jis par haae vo bhii nishaanaa yaad karo ham the tumaharethreedots  haathon men aa ke daaman chhuut na jaaen yeh do dilon ke rishate tuut na jaaen dil se kabhii jo dil ne kahaa thaa haae vo bhii fasaanaa yaad karo ham the tumaharethreedots

Title: gariibon kii duniyaa jahaan se niraalii
Lyrics: gariibon kii duniyaa jahaan se niraalii na koii shahanshaah na koii sawaalii  hain zaradaar duniyaa men zar ke diiwaane gariibon ke ghar pyaar ke hain kazaane gariibon kii duniyaa kaa allaah waalii  jo mahalon men jalate hain ghii ke chiraag to kutiyaa men jalate hain siine ke daag udhar zar kii surkii  idhar kuun kii laalii  amiiron ke siine se rahataa hai duur gariibon ke siine men allaah kaa nuur guruurotakabbur se siinaa hai kaalii

Title: bhaarat kii vidhavaa dukhiyaarii
Lyrics: bhaarat kii vidhavaa dukhiyaarii bhaarat kii vidhavaa ko 	bhaarat kii vidhavaa dukhiyaarii bhaarat kii vidhavaa  bin maalik ke khetii jaaye 2 chor kaisaa nazar lagaaye 2 laage aag bhasam ho jaaye 2 suukhe jiiwan kii phulawaarii ko 	bhaarat kii vidhavaa dukhiyaarii bhaarat kii vidhavaa  saasuu devar jeth dhikkaare 2 har kii kaaii jaaii pukaare 2 maat pitaa bhii thokar maare 2 vipad padii dukhiyaa pe bhaarii ko 	bhaarat kii vidhavaa dukhiyaarii bhaarat kii vidhavaa   jaagojaago hosh men aavo ghar men laagii aag bujhaavo  2 vidhavaaon ke kasht mitaavo 2 tumhen dekhatii duniyaa saarii ko 	bhaarat kii vidhavaa dukhiyaarii bhaarat kii vidhavaa

Title: bichhade hue paradesii ik baar to aanaa tuu
Lyrics: bichhade hue paradesii  2 ik baar to aanaa tuu jab aankh milaaii hai nazaren na churaanaa tuu bichhade hue paradesii threedots  vaade bhii kie tuune khaaii thii qasam merii 2 vaadon pe hii jiitii huun hai aas mujhe terii 2  itanii hai aarazuu merii  2 mujhako na bhulaanaa tuu jab aankh milaaii threedots  duniyaa mujhe chhiine hai sabane mujhe gheraa hai 2 aur merii zubaan par to bas naam hii teraa hai 2  duniyaa na hanse mujh par  2 itanaa na rulaanaa tuu jab aankh milaaii threedots  gairon kaa na ho jaanaa jab apanaa banaayaa hai 2 paas aa ke na kho jaanaa jab dil men basaayaa hai 2  jo baat kahii tuune  2 vo baat nibhaanaa tuu jab aankh milaaii threedots

Title: muhabbat men kabhii aisii bhii
Lyrics: muhabbat men kabhii aisii bhii haalat paaii jaatii hai 2 tabiiyat aur ghabaraatii hai jab bahalaaii jaatii hai 2  jhijhak kar guftaguu karanaa hai apanaa raaz kah denaa 2 isii naazuk sii parde men 2 tamannaa paaii jaatii hai  isii naazuk sii parde men tamannaa paaii jaatii hai muhabbat men kabhii aisii bhii haalat paaii jaatii hai  mohabbat dil men chhup sakatii hai aankhon men nahiin chhupatii 2 zabaan khaamosh hai lekin 2 nazar sharamaaii jaatii hai zabaan khaamosh hai lekin nazar sharamaaii jaatii hai muhabbat men kabhii aisii bhii haalat paaii jaatii hai tabiiyat aur ghabaraatii hai jab bahalaaii jaatii hai

Title: main kyaa jaanuun kyaa jaaduu hai
Lyrics: main kyaa jaanuun kyaa jaaduu hai  3  2 in do matavale nainon men jaaduu hai  3 main kyaa jaanuun threedots  ek ek athah sagar sa hai  2 in do matavale nainon men jadu hai  3 main kyaa jaanuun threedots  man puchh raha hai ab mujhase nainon ne kaha hai kya tujhase   2 jab nain mile nainon ne kaha  2 jab nain mile nainon ne kaha ab nain base ke nainon men main kyaa jaanuun threedots

Title: yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko bhuulaa huaa zamaanaa
Lyrics: yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko bhuulaa huaa zamaanaa  2 yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko  har shay pe zindagii thii har chiiz par jawaanii 2 aankhon men ik kahaanii honthon pe ik taraanaa yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko bhuulaa huaa zamaanaa yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko  unakii adaayen dil ko ab yaad aa rahii hain 2 chupake se unakaa aanaa aur mujhako chuum jaanaa  yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko bhuulaa huaa zamaanaa yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko  dil ko kabar nahiin thii ban jaayegaa kisii din 2 do dil kaa muskuraanaa rone kaa ek bahaanaa   yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko bhuulaa huaa zamaanaa  2 yaad aa rahaa hai dil ko

Title: letii hain dambadam balaayen
Lyrics: letii hain dambadam balaayen tere gulazaar kii 2 uunchii daaliyon se duur 2 zaalimaan ke pyaar kii 3 letii hain dambadam balaayen  chhaaii hai haay is tarah kushii hans rahii hai jyuun kalii haanhaan hans rahii hai jyuun kalii aaj raat dhuum hai dhuundhatii bahaar bhii 3  letii hain dambadam balaayen  ishq men ho ke baag baar shokii se pii rahe hain sabaa 2 is duaaen detii hai ras bharii phuhaar bhii 2  letii hain dambadam balaayen tere gulazaar kii 2 uunchii daaliyon se duur 2 zaalimaan ke pyaar kii 3 letii hain dambadam balaayen

Title: tum aankhon se duur ho saathiyaa beliyaa saajanaa
Lyrics: nuur jahaan tum aankhon se duur ho huii niind aankhon se duur mere saathii gam kii chot se huaa dil kaa shiishaa chuur saathiyaa beliyaa saajanaa ho o o threedots  durraanii mujhe shikavaa hai taqadiir se nahiin tumase koii gilaa haay nahiin tumase koii gilaa mujhe laakar yuun pardes men meraa sab kuchh chhiin liyaa haay meraa sab kuchh chiin liyaa saathiyaa beliyaa saajanaa ho o oy threedots  nuur jahaan merii aankhon men aansuu aa base huun rone par majabuur mere zakm hue pardesiyaa aa risris ke naasuur saathiyaa beliyaa saajanaa ho o o threedots  durraanii mujhe rogii karake pyaar kaa diyaa gam kaa rog lagaa haay diyaa gam kaa rog lagaa mere jalate hue charaag ko merii qismat gaii bujhaa haay merii qismat gaii bujhaa saathiyaa beliyaa saajanaa ho o oy threedots  nuur jahaan mujhe dhokaa diyaa nasiib ne nahiin meraa koii kusuur	2 saathiyaa beliyaa saajanaa ho o o threedots

Title: saanjh bhaye ghar aayaa panchhii
Lyrics: saanjh bhaye ghar aayaa panchhii bhor bhaye ud jaanaa hai jis daalii par kiyaa baseraa usako bhii murajhanaa hai  chuptaa ke biptaa aatii hai chot chot pe lagatii hai tuu ne jo kuchh ulajhaayaa hai tujh ko hii sulajhaanaa hai  bahrii duniyaa ke kaanon men tuu apanaa raag sunaae jaa tuute taaron kii biinaa se tujh ko jii bahalaanaa hai  himmat ko mat haar badhe jaa aandhii aur tuufaanon men tujh ko apanii manzil par hii apanaa desh basaanaa hai

Title: koii duniyaa men hamaarii tarah barbaad na ho
Lyrics: na tadapane kii ijaazat hai na fariyaad kii hai ghut ke mar jaauun ye marzii mere saiyaad kii hai  koii duniyaa men hamaarii tarah barbaad na ho dil to rota ho magar honthon pe fariyaad na ho dil to rota ho magarthreedots  de ke ik pyaar bharaa dil merii qisamat ne kahaa jaa tere pyaar kii duniyaa kabhii aabaad na ho dil to rota ho magarthreedots  pahale chhiinaa thaa tujhe ab lelii nishaanii terii duniyaa kahatii hai ke dil men bhii terii yaad na ho dil to rota ho magarthreedots

Title: har ek baat pe kahate ho tum ke tuu kyaa hai
Lyrics: har ek baat pe kahate ho tum ke tuu kyaa hai tumhiin bataao ye andaazeguftaguu kyaa hai 2 har ek baat  ragon men daudane ragon men daudate phirane ke ham nahiin qaail jab aankh hii se na tapakaa to phir lahuu kyaa hai 2 har ek baat  piyuun sharaab e piyuun sharaab agar kum bhii dekh luun dochaar ye shiishaaoqadahokuuzaaosubuu kyaa hai 2 har ek baat pe kahate ho tum ke tuu  huaa hai shah kaa musaahib huaa hai shah kaa musaahib phire hai itaraataa 2 wagaranaa shahar men gaalib kii aabaruu kyaa hai 2 har ek baat pe kahate ho tum ke tuu

Lyrics: ik baar tuu ban jaa meraa o paradesii phir dekh mazaa  2 mil jaaye mujhe dil teraa o paradesii phir dekh mazaa 2   jhinakat jhinakat jhingilalaa jhingilalaa  2 hoy oy hoy oy  jeth kaa mahiinaa ho bhiigiibhiigii raat ho baajare ke khet men pahalii mulaaqaat ho haay pahalii mulaaqaat ho  hoy oy hoy oy  aaye jab besaakh piyaa mele ke nazaare hon haath men haan haath teraa aankhon men ishaare hon jii aankhon men ishaare hon  phir dekh mazaa 2   jhinakat jhinakat jhingilalaa jhingilalaa  2 hoy oy hoy oy  jeth aur ashaad men nadii kaa kinaaraa ho piyaa terii aankhon men pyaar kaa ishaaraa ho haay pyaar kaa ishaaraa ho  hoy oy hoy oy  ho saawan men jhuulaauun jhuulaa aangan ho gulazaar kaa gharghar men phir charchaa ho jii teremere pyaar kaa haay teremere pyaar kaa  phir dekh mazaa 2   jhinakat jhinakat jhingilalaa jhingilalaa  2 hoy oy hoy oy  bhaado kii barasaat men dil na rahe haath men aayen jab puus piyaa hawaa sardsard ho teremere dilon men phir miithaamiithaa dard ho haay miithaamiithaa dard ho  phir dekh mazaa  ik baar tuu ban jaa meraa o paradesii phir dekh mazaa   jhinakat jhinakat jhingilalaa jhingilalaa  2 hoy oy hoy oy  kaatak kaa mahiinaa ho paas na tere aauun main raamaa mohe dar laage simatiisimatii jaauun main  aaghan kii andherii raaten karatii hon jab saansaan rahrah kar tum mujhe bulaavo kahatii jaauun naa naa main kahatii jaauun naa naa  phir dekh mazaa 2   jhinakat jhinakat jhingilalaa jhingilalaa  2 hoy oy hoy oy  oy pos kaa mahiinaa ho mil luun tere baap se teraameraa pyaar hai kah duun tere baap se main kah duun tere baap se  hoy oy hoy oy  maagh men taiyaarii piyaa phaagun men phaagun men phaagun men main kaise kahuun phaagun men sigaaii ho teraa dil karataa ho yuunyuun aankh merii sharamaaii ho jii aankh merii sharamaaii ho  phir dekh mazaa ik baar tuu ban jaa meraa o paradesii phir dekh mazaa

Title: desh hamaaraa hindustaan sabase sundar hindustaan
Singer: hemant bela mukherjee samaresh roy abha banerjee
Lyrics: he  agar garaj ke kah sakataa hai tarkii tarkiish jaatii kaa      agar garv se inglish kehataa inglaind hai angrezon kaa      to kyon naa kahe ham bhaaratavaasii hindustaan hamaaraa hai      hindustaan hamaaraa hai hindustaan hamaaraa hai  sab desh hamaaraa hindustaan sabase sundar hindustaan      viiron kaa ye janmasthaan jay jay bhaarat hindustaan  he  mandir masjid ved puuraan sab kaa puujak hai inasaan      sab se badhakar hindustaan jay jay bhaarat hindustaan  be  hindu musalim ek samaan pyaare bhaarat ke santaan      aao sab mil gaayen gaan jay jay bhaarat hindustaan threedots  he  jisamen hai kuchh maan kii shaan      jisamen hai kuchh maan kii aan      vahii mitaataa apanii hastii rakhane hindustaan kii shaan threedots  he be taaj mahal hai aaj jahaan par dillii kaa hai laal qilaa sa     is dharatii ke inasaanon ko aazaadii hai aaj milaa sa be aaj desh kii aazaadii hai hindustaaniyon ke haath         baag dor kii saarii taaqat bhaaratavaasiyon ke paas         isakii bastii isakii hastii apane bhaarat maan kii shaan         aaj likho tum hansate basate apanii hindustaan kii shaan threedots

Lyrics: duniyaa kyaa jaane meraa afasaanaa kyuun gaaye dil ulafat kaa taraanaa  2 duniyaa kyaa jaane  ho o o  niind na aaye dil bas men nahiin tuu hai kahiin to piyaa main huun kahiin  2 o saajanawaa re o baalamawaa re chaandanii raaten aur ye samaan rut bhii anokhii main bhii jawaan main bhii diiwaanii tuu bhii diiwaanaa phir kaise biite mausam suhaanaa  ho o   raat kate na bin tere piyaa aajaa akele nahiin laage jiyaa  2 o saajanawaa re o baalamawaa re jhilamil taare mast havaa chhed de muralii aa ke zaraa ho o tere sang gaauun main kyaa gaanaa sunsun ke jisako naache zamaanaa  duniyaa kyaa jaane meraa afasaanaa kyuun gaaye dil ulafat kaa taraanaa duniyaa kyaa jaane

Lyrics: he nazar niichii kie ham aa rahe hain     hamaarii raah men aankhen bichhaao      ham apanii bhuul par sharamaa rahe hain     hamaarii bhuul ab tum bhuul jaao  ka idhar bechain ik dil hai udhar tum     idhar aankhon kii mushkil hai udhar tum  he ye aankhen kah rahii hain munh chhupaao     magar dil kah rahaa aankhen milaao     hamaarii bhuul ab tum bhuul jaao  ka jawaanii kah rahii hai ruuth jaao he muhabbat kah rahii hai muskuraao ka jawaanii kah rahii aanchal chhudaao he muhabbat kah rahii baanhon men laao  donon  hamaarii bhuul ab tum bhuul jaao

Lyrics: aaii divaalii aaii divaalii  2 dipak sang naache patangaa  main kisake sang naachuun bataajaa  aaii divaalii aaii divaalii threedots  bachapan javani sang naachake chala gayaa   ab naache javani budhaape sang vo din aa gayaa   2 ab naache javani budhaape sang vo din aa gayaa  bichhade hue sathi zaraa aa  main kisake sang naachun bataajaa  aaii divaalii aaii divaalii threedots  kisako gumaan tha vo din bhi guzar jaayenge aur ek baar jaake vo phir laut ke na aayenge   2 bichhade hue sathi zaraa aa  main kisake sang naachuun bataajaa   aaii divaalii aaii divaalii    2 dipak sang naache patangaa  main kisake sang naachuun bataajaa  aaii divaalii aaii divaalii threedots

Title: mere bas kii baat jo hotii
Lyrics: mere bas kii baat jo hotii     main badalii ban jaatii  badalii ban kar naach dikhaatii     niile niile ambar par kabhii barasatii kheton par     kabhii barasatii mandar par bunden banakar barakhaawaalii     badalii men chhan jaatii mere bas kii threedots  suukhe ped ire kar detii     motiyon se jangal bhar detii kadii dhuup men chaadar banakar     duniyaaapar tan jaatii mere bas kii threedots

Title: daataa torii dayaa se ab des hamaaraa  jo des kal nahiin thaa
Lyrics: daataa torii dayaa se ab des hamaaraa jo des kal nahiin thaa wo des phir hamaaraa 2 chamakaa hai baadalon se 2 tuutaa huaa sitaaraa jo des kal nahiin thaa wo des phir hamaaraa  des hamaaraa 2 apanii sharan men raakho prabhu 2 hamen raakho prabhu jo des kal nahiin thaa wo des phir hamaaraa 2 jo des kal nahiin thaa wo des phir hamaaraa  bhagawan ye bhakt tere kyuun kar naa giit gaayen 2 man kii banaa ke maalaa charanon pe ham chadhaayen man kii banaa ke maalaa charanon pe ham chadhaayen ye dagamagaataa bedaa tumane hii paar utaaraa ye des phir hamaaraa jo des kal nahiin thaa wo des phir hamaaraa  jo des kal nahiin thaa nahiin thaa wo des phir hamaaraa 2  ho patalii kamariyaa morii ho baalamaa balamaa 2 ho baalamaa nain milaa ke kiyaa kyaa ishaaraa 2 ye pyaaraa pyaaraa jo des kal tak nahiin thaa wo des phir hai hamaaraa 2  ho ho main to ai maiyaa marii ho baalamaa balamaa 2 ho baalamaa  dil luut ke le gayaa hai aankhon kaa terii kaajal o ho ho 3 ho tuu nain hove nainaa 2 chhodo to moraa aanchal 2  o ho patalii kamariyaa morii ho baalamaa balamaa 2 ho baalamaa  ye dil kisii kaa dil hai todo na dil hamaaraa 2 jo des kal nahiin thaa wo des phir hai hamaaraa 2

Lyrics: aankhen to huii band magar dard jagaaye dil yaad men kisiikii zaraa rone lagaa re rone lagaa re rone lagaa re dil yaad men kisiikii zaraa rone lagaa re  dil men dukhaa kvaab hai aankhon men andheraa aankhon men andheraa ho gayaa barabaada meraa rain baseraa rain baseraa ab hoke judaa donon lage hain jaa kinaare dil yaad men kisiikii zaraa rone lagaa re  ishq kiyaa husn kii tasviiren banaaiin   2 chhod ke tasviir ek baaqii mitaaiin  2 ab jii rahaa huun main isii tinake ke sahaare dil yaad men kisii kii zaraa rone lagaa re  milane kii tamannaa se mujhe chaina nahiin hai dina raata merii priita use dhuundh rahii hai aa jaaye kahiin vo mila jaaye kahiin vo  2 mila jaaye to rakhuun use palakon men chhupaaye dil yaad men kisiikii zaraa rone lagaa re

Lyrics: haay raam kaise bedardii se paalaa padaa paalaa padaa haay raam kaise bedardii se paalaa padaa binatii hii binatii men biit gaii aaj shaam 2 haay raam kaise bedardii se paalaa padaa paalaa padaa haay raam kaise bedardii se paalaa padaa  zaalim ne jiiwan ke sapanon ko chuur kiyaa 2 aa hamako hamaarii hii nazaron se duur kiyaa aankhon hii aankhon men dil ko majabuur kiyaa 2 baaton men baaton men rok diye saare kaam  haay raam kaise bedardii se paalaa padaa paalaa padaa haay raam kaise bedardii se paalaa padaa  bhedii koii man kii nagarii ko luut gayaa 2 aa daaman mere dil kaa haathon se chhuut gayaa mujh par jo chhaayaa thaa jaaduu wo tuut gayaa 2 milate hii aankhen main japane lagii raam naam  haay raam kaise bedardii se paalaa padaa paalaa padaa haay raam kaise bedardii se paalaa padaa

Lyrics: tuu duur hai aankhon se2 mere dil ko ye gam hai dil ko ye gam hai aajaa merii duniyaa men2 tujhe merii kasam hai merii kasam hai  bechain huun mil ne kii zaraakhol de raahen khol de raahen diidaar kii hasrat men tadapatii hai nigaahen haaye nigaahen is dil ke liye teraa naa mil naa hii sitam hai2 aajaa merii duniyaa men threedots  chamakaade tuu aakar merii qismat kaa sitaaraa qismat kaa sitaaraa rastaa naa bhatak jaaun zaraa de de sahaaraa de de sahaaraa ulfat kii zamiin par meraa pahalaa hii kadam hai2 aajaa merii duniyaa men threedots

Title: ghirghir ban men ghor ghataa chhaaii
Lyrics: ghirghir ban men ghor ghataa chhaaii o more yaad terii aaii  ghirghir ghirghir giren jharoke aur kaun milane ke mauqe o barakhaa dulahan ban ke aaii ghirghir ban men ghor ghataa chhaaii o mohe yaad terii aaii  saavan aayaa piyaa lo jii tum bhii to ghar aao naa aj more anganaa men aao aao aa ke jaao na kalap kalap haarii aur mohe kalapaao na o mohe yaad terii aaii ghirghir ban men ghor ghataa chhaaii o mohe yaad terii aaii  khidkii khol khidii nainan kii kuchh sun jaa kuchh kah jaa re man kii o main ne kaisii aag lagaaii ghirghir ban men ghor ghataa chhaaii o mohe yaad terii aaii ghirghir ban men ghor ghataa chhaaii  iraadaa thaa ki shaadii kar ke apanaa ghar basaaen ge kabhii aaluu kabhii gobhii kabhii murgaa pakaaen ge magar har roz patalii daal khaaii aap kyuun roe

Title: ye duniyaa ruup kii chor bachaa le mujhe baabuu
Lyrics: ye duniyaa ruup kii chor 2 bachaa le mujhe baabuu 2 bachaa le mujhe baabuu re ye duniyaa ruup kii chor  ho raste men milaa ik bangaalii dhotii dhiiliidhaalii raste men milaa ik bangaalii darashan kaa abhilaashii wo kahane lagaa kyaa wo kahane lagaa jol khaabe rasogulaa khaabe aur kahane lagaa amii tumii bhaalobaashii maaii rii bhaalobaashii bhaalobaashii main kyaa jaanuun amii tumii main bhaagii tumhaarii or  bachaa le mujhe baabuu 2 bachaa le mujhe baabuu re ye duniyaa ruup kii chor  huii mulaakaat merii ek gujaraatii se kahane lagaa mujhe saaro chhe saaro chhe suun chhe kem chhe kem chhe saaro chhe chhe chhe chhe chhe o maare te aangane ek vaar aavo jo 3 main kyaa jaanuun aavo jo aavo jo bhaagii tumhaarii or  bachaa le mujhe baabuu 2 bachaa le mujhe baabuu re ye duniyaa ruup kii chor  ek maraathaa saahab aalaa aate hii sab gadabad ni kahe aisaa kaay kabhii kahe taajaa kaay as kaay das kaay as kaay das kaay bar bar bar bar bar chatk chaandanii ikadeiye zaraa ikadeiye jii jii jii jii jii jii ag buulaa baachaa kadii zaraa ikadeiye zaraa ikadeiye jii jii jii jii jii jii  main kyaa jaanuun ikade tikade bhaagii tumhaarii or  bachaa le mujhe baabuu 2 bachaa le mujhe baabuu re ye duniyaa ruup kii chor  e ek madaraasii lagaa bulaane e main lagii jaane to wo lagaa gaane e chakrapane aadii rukmaniye inne naadi vandane e nakkii ked vandade e chakrapane aadii rukmaniye unne naadi vandane e nakkii ked vandade e  he he sun ke ho gayaa bukhaar mujhe bhaagii tumhaarii or  bachaa le mujhe baabuu 2 bachaa le mujhe baabuu re ye duniyaa ruup kii chor  o raste men milaa ik panjaabii kahane lagaa terii ankhiyaan gulaabii terii ankhiyaan gulaabii o balle balle balle balle  o baliye o lassiye o soniye malaaiye kitaaii mainuu sharaabii ho jab kaar ke gaddii hii biich bah jaate royen giich ped khaayengii chhaii chhaii chhaii chhaii sun ke chappale utaar ke bhaagii tumhaarii or  bachaa le mujhe baabuu 2 bachaa le mujhe baabuu re ye duniyaa ruup kii chor

Title: chandaa re jaa re jaa re
Lyrics: chandaa re jaa re jaa re 2  chandaa re jaa re jaa re piyaa se sandesaa moraa kahiyo jaa  2 moraa tum bin jiyaa naa laage re piyaa 2 mohe ik pal chain na aaye chandaa re jaa re jaa re piyaa se sandesaa moraa kahiyo jaa chandaa re jaa re jaa re  kis ke man men jaaye base ho 2 hamare man men agan lagaaye 2 hamane torii yaad men baalam diip jalaaye diip bujhaaye phir bhii teraa man naa pighalaa hamane kitane niir bahaaye chandaa threedots jaa re jaa re chandaa re jaa re jaa re piyaa se sandesaa moraa kahiyo jaa chandaa re jaa re jaa re  ghadiyaan gin gin din biitat hain 2 ankhiyon men kat jaaye rainaa 2 torii aas liye baithe hain hanste nainaa rote nainaa 2 hamane torii raah men priitam pag pag pe hai nain bichhaaye chandaa threedots jaa re jaa re chandaa re jaa re jaa re piyaa se sandesaa moraa kahiyo jaa chandaa re jaa re jaa re piyaa se sandesaa moraa kahiyo jaa moraa tum bin jiyaa na laage re piya 2 mohe ek pal chain na aaye chandaa re jaa re jaa re

Lyrics: ummiid bharaa panchhiithaa khoj rahaa sajanii kahataa thaa yahii panchhiihaay dekho re gaii sajanii haay dekho re gaii sajanii2  taaron bharii rajaniiaanchal ko fasaa re 2 puuch rahii hansaketuu kisako pukaare tuu kisako pukaare nainan men niir bharedard sambhaale ummiid bharaa panchhii threedots  rajaniimohe na sataadil na jalaaitanaa bataa kahaan gaii sajaniio kahaan gaii sajanii2 aansuu hain mere nainon kenaa ho sakii  buunde 2 dil men lagii aag lagaaman men milan ke ho man men milan ke haalat meretujhe taras na aaye ummiid bharaa panchhii threedots

Title: begam janiyaan kii godii bharii
Lyrics: begam janiyaan kii godii bharii hamarii laado banii hai parii  dhuumen chhatii kii machaao sakhii rii hilamil ke gaao bajaao sakhii rii kaahe dholak kinaare dharii  kaisii chhatii kii dulhaniyaa hai pyaarii jodaa suhaanaa hai gahanaa hai bhaarii aao minnat sakhii ham karii  saramaaye naajo lajaaye chhabiilii dhiire chale jhukake morii lajiilii dekhe ko taare chhamaachham chalii hai duudhon nahaaii hai  puuton phalii hai kudaa raakhe jam jam yuun khetii harii

Title: kaun samajhegaa  dil aane ke dhang niraale hain
Lyrics: kaun samajhegaa kise samajhaauun dil kii baat ye samajhane kaa fasaanaa hai naa samajhane kii baat   dil aane ke dhang niraale hain dil aane ke dhang 2 dil se majabuur sab dilawaale hain dil aane ke dhang dil aane ke dhang niraale hain dil aane ke dhang   kabhii ankhiyaan milaane pe aataa hai dil kabhii ankhiyaan bachaane pe aataa hai dil  2 wohii ankhiyon jinhen hamase matalab nahiin unhiin ankhiyon ke ham matawaale hain dil aane ke dhang dil aane ke dhang niraale hain dil aane ke dhang   unako dekhaa to duniyaa badalane lagii nazaren bahakiin tabiiyat machalane lagii dil kii dhadakan ishaaron pe chalane lagii  2 badii himmat se qaabuu men rakhaa hai dil badii mushkil se hosh sambhaale hain dil aane ke dhang dil aane ke dhang niraale hain dil aane ke dhang

Title: phir mujhe diidaaetar yaad aayaa
Lyrics: aa phir mujhe diidaae phir mujhe diidaae tar yaad aayaa haan phir mujhe diidaaetar yaad aayaa dil jigar tishanaaefariyaad aayaa 2 phir mujhe diidaaetar yaad  dam liyaa thaa na dam liyaa thaa na qayaamat ne hanoz 2 phir teraa waqte phir teraa waqtesafar yaad aayaa 2 phir mujhe diidaaetar yaad ho phir mujhe diidaaetar yaad  koii wiiraanii sii koii wiiraanii sii wiiraanii hai dasht ko dekh ke ghar yaad aayaa haan phir mujhe diidaaetar yaad ho haan phir mujhe diidaae  mainne majanuun pe mainne majanuun pe ladakapan men asad 2 sang uthaayaa thaa sang uthaayaa thaa ke sar yaad aayaa ho sang uthaayaa thaa ke sar yaad aayaa phir mujhe diidaaetar yaad

Title: kise maaluum thaa do din men saavan biit jaayegaa
Lyrics: kise maaluum thaa do din men saavan biit jaayegaa tamannaaen hamarii yuun tadapatii chhod jaayegaa saavan biit jaayegaa kise maaluum thaa threedots  dilebetaab terii yaad men aansuu bahaayegaa hamen rahrah ke ye zaalim zamaanaa yaad aayegaa saavan biit jaayegaa kise maaluum thaa do din men threedots  zabaan bedardiyaan us kii na kahane paayegii lekin hamaarii aankh kaa paanii kahaanii kah sunaayegaa saavan biit jaayegaa kise maaluum thaa threedots  jahaan vaalon are ham ne kisii kaa kyaa bigaadaa thaa hamaarii raah men bhagavaan bhii kaante bichhaayegaa saavan biit jaayegaa kise maaluum thaa threedots

Title: mujh se pahalii sii mohabbat mere mahabuub na maang
Lyrics: mujh se pahalii sii mohabbat mere mahabuub na maang	 4 mainne samajhaa thaa ke tuu hai to darakshaan hai hayaat teraa gam hai to gamedahar kaa jhagadaa kyaa hai terii suurat se hai aalam men bahaaron ko sabaat terii aankhon ke sivaa duniyaa men rakhaa kyaa hai	 2 tuu jo mil jaae to taqadiir nigon ho jaae yuun na thaa mainne faqat chaahaa thaa yuun ho jaae mujh se pahalii sii mohabbat mere mahabuub na maang  anaginat sadiyon ke taariik bahimaanaa talism reshoathalasokamakaabobaazaar men jism kaak men litade hue kuun men nahalaae hue laut jaatii hai idhar ko bhii nazar kyaa kiije ab bhii dilakash hai teraa husn magar kyaa kiije	 2 aur bhii dukh hain zamaane men mohabbat ke sivaa raahaten aur bhii hain vasl kii raahat ke sivaa  mujh se pahalii sii mohabbat mere mahabuub na maang

Lyrics: main in phuulon sang doluun re doluun doluun doluun re main kuun kuun boluun re kuun kuun boluun re main koyal kii sii boluun re boluun boluun boluun re  o main naachuun aur gaauun 2 rangaraliyaan manaauun manaauun  main  thumakthumak ke chaluun shaan se ras barasaauun re  2 har dil ko ro luun re 2 aa main in phuulon sang doluun re doluun doluun doluun re  kabhii phuulon ke sang bulabul kii main shaadiiraas rachaatii  kabhii pawan mukhii mastaanii aankh ke motii mor lutaatii  2 amrit saa gholuun re 2  main kuun kuun boluun re kuun kuun boluun re main koyal kii sii boluun re boluun boluun boluun re

Title: aaii ajal ai zindagii gam kaa zamaanaa tal gayaa
Lyrics: haan aaii ajal ai zindagii gam kaa zamaanaa tal gayaa ab kyaa girengii bijaliyaan jab aashiyaan hii jal gayaa  aa o shabegam aaye jaa saare jahaan par chhaaye jaa ab tuu hii tuu rah jaayegii ab kal na haragiz aayegii wo din jo dushman thaa teraa wo zindagii kaa din meraa wo din hameshaa ke liye haan din wahii din bhar gayaa  gam kaa zamaanaa tal gayaa  is umr kaa awwalapanaa is umr kaa aakirapanaa ek jhuuth kaa darabaar hai baatilapanaa zaahilapanaa ye zindagii kuchh bhii nahiin 2 naatak kaa jhuuthaa khel hai jab tak chalaa so chal gayaa  gam kaa zamaanaa tal gayaa  haan aaii ajal ai zindagii gam kaa zamaanaa tal gayaa ab kyaa girengii bijaliyaan jab aashiyaan hii jal gayaa

Title: tuu chandaa main terii chakorii
Lyrics: dilashaad tuu chandaa main terii chakorii dekho sudh bisaraa ke morii kal ko naa tarasaanaa naa tarasaanaa chood na jaanaa naa jaanaa  purush tuu koyal main teraa taraanaa dekho kar ke mujhe diwaanaa kal ko bhuul na jaanaa bhuul na jaanaa tod nibhaanaa nibhaanaa  di tuu bane meraa naa meraa main to terii ho lii pu aaj amiirii aur gariibii donon khelen holii di ohoho merii bhiigo dii cholii mainne thaa ghar jaanaa  di vo dekho ik ped pe baithe hain do panchhii pyaare pu milen to hain par bichhad na jaayen kahiin nasiibo maare di do dil milate dekh ke duniyaa sau sau zulm guzaare pu par tum naa ghabaraanaa

Title: ham aaj kahiin dil kho baithe yuun samajho kisii ke ho baithe
Lyrics: ham aj kahin dil kho baithe yun samajho kisi ke ho baithe  ham aj kahin threedots   haradam jo koi pas ane laga bhed ulfat ke samajhane laga  nazaron se nazar kaa takarana tha dil ke liye ik afasana  ham hathon se dil ko ganva baithe ham aj kahin threedots   ankhon men samaya koi magar kaun aya kisi ko kya ye khabar  puchho to yahi hai usaka pata chanchal naina aur shokh ada  ham dil ki naiyya dubo baithe ham aj kahin threedots

Lyrics: maar gaii re 2 hamen terii najariyaa pyaarii najariyaa nirachhii najariyaa maar gaii hamen maar gaii re maar gaii re hamen terii najariyaa pyaarii najariyaa nirachhii najariyaa maar gaii  aap kahen main jaaduugaranii 2 jo dekhe bas hoy 2 zulf kahe mere pench niraale 2 chhuut sake na koy zaalim maar daalaa 2  maar gaii hamen maar gaii re maar gaii re hamen terii najariyaa pyaarii najariyaa nirachhii najariyaa maar gaii   aankhon men aankhon ko daalo dil ko apane dil men sambhaalo  2 kaanon men kuchh kah do hamase bas jaaye re ik prem nagariyaa 2  maar gaii hamen maar gaii re maar gaii re hamen terii najariyaa pyaarii najariyaa nirachhii najariyaa maar gaii  aankh kare hai kise ishaare 2 joban kisako ankhiyaan maare aankh kare hai kise ishaare joban kisako ankhiyaan maare mast kiyaa kisakii mastii ne 2 kaun tihaare hain sanwariyaa bol haan bol bol kaun tihaare hain sanwariyaa  maar gaii hamen maar gaii re maar gaii re hamen terii najariyaa pyaarii najariyaa nirachhii najariyaa maar gaii

Title: chaandanii raat aur taare khile hon
Lyrics: kuchaandanii raat aur taare khile hon3 sataaron kii chainyyaa men do dil mile hon2 kuchaandanii raat aur taare khile hon3  sabadariyaa men chandaa ghadii bhar ko jaaye2 kukoii mere kaanon men kuchh kahane aaye2 samaanuun to hans de kuna maanuun to ruuthe2 saduniyaa  jaaye do dilhonth  mile hon kuchaandanii raat aur taare khile hon2  samain chhup huun main chhup huun to unakaa jiyaa baithaa jaaye2 kumain puuchuun main puuchuun to unakaa jiyaa talmalaaye 2 kabhii main manaauun kabhii vo manaaye2 nigaahen milen  saare khile hon nigaahen milen  saare khile hon bothchaandanii raat aur taare khile hon2 taaron kii chainyyaa men do dil mile hon2 chaandanii raat aur taare khile hon2

Title: kaamosh nigaahen ye sunaatii hain kahaanii
Lyrics: kaamosh nigaahen ye sunaatii hain kahaanii 2 lo aaj chalii thokaren khaane ko jawaanii kaamosh nigaahen 2  ye maan liyaa panchhii ye maan liyaa kaat liye par hain kisii ne par dil kii kahaanii to hai piyaa ko sunaanii kaamosh nigaahen 2  har suu hai andheraa to diyaa ik bhii jale kyuun phuutii huii qisamat ko hai ab thokaren khaanii kaamosh nigaahen 2  hai raat suhaanii diye jalate hain hazaaron 2 hasarat ke andhere se banii aaj diiwaanii aaj diiwaanii kaamosh nigaahen 2  shaayad ye tere ujade hue dil kii hai tasaviir paanii kii ravaanii men chiraagon kii ravaanii kaamosh nigaahen 2  gharbaar ujaadaa terii furaqat men junuun se siine se lagaa rakhii hai ik terii nishaanii ik terii nishaanii kaamosh nigaahen 2  baazaar men dhuundhaa tujhe galiyon men pukaaraa afasos kisii ne naa sunii aur naa maanii aur naa maanii kaamosh nigaahen 2  dinraat tujhe dhuundh rahii e dinraat tujhe dhuundh rahii hain merii aankhen jaayenge jahaan le chale ashqon kii ravaanii kaamosh nigaahen 2  taqadiir dareyaar pe aakhir mujhe laayii haan taqadiir dareyaar pe aakir mujhe laayii sun dil kii kahaanii merii aankhon kii zubaanii kaamosh nigaahen 2

Title: rain gayii ab huaa saveraa
Lyrics: rain gayii ab huaa saveraa yaad terii ne gheraa hai 2 rain gayii ab huaa saveraa  tumase nain lagaake saajan 2 duniyaa se munh pheraa hai rain gayii ab huaa saveraa  tum to dil kii dhadakan banake dil me aake baith gaye 2 is ghar ko jo kho baithaa hai 2 us kaa kaun baseraa hai rain gayii ab huaa saveraa  man ke panchhii sochsamajh le vah jaaduu kii nagarii hai 2 sambhal sambhal kar ghar aanaa nazaron ne jaal bakheraa hai rain gayii ab huaa saveraa yaad terii ne gheraa hai rain gayii ab huaa saveraa

Title: ai qaatibetaqadiir mujhe itanaa bataa de
Lyrics: ai qaatibetaqadiir mujhe itanaa bataa de 2 kyon mujhase kafaa hai tuu kyaa mainne kiyaa hai  auron ko khushii mujhako fakat dardoranjogam duniyaa ko hansii aur mujhe ronaa diyaa hai kyaa mainne kiyaa hai 2 kyon mujhase kafaa hai tuu kyaa mainne kiyaa hai  hisse men sabake aaii hainthreedots hisse men sabake aaii hain rangiin bahaaren badfaqtiyaan lekin mujhe shiishe men utaaren piite hain piite hain rog rozoshab muzzarraton kii may main huun ke sataa khuunejigar mainne piyaa hai  kyaa mainne piyaa hai kyaa mainne piyaa hai  thaa jinake dumak dam se ye aabaad aashiyaan ho chahachahaatii ho chahachahaatii bulabulen jaane gaii kahaan juganuu kii chamak hai na sitaaron kii roshanii is ghup andhere men hai merii jaan par banii kyaa thii kyaa thii kyaa thii bataa ke jisakii sazaa tuune mujhako dii  kyaa thaa kyaa thaa gunah ke jisakaa badalaa mujhase liyaa hai  kyaa mainne kiyaa hai kyaa mainne kiyaa hai kyon mujhase kafaa hai tuu kyaa mainne kiyaa hai

Lyrics: tum hamen bhuul gae ham na tumhen bhuul sake 2 tum hamen bhuul gae threedots  meraa tuutaa huaa dil unako dikhaao jaa kar ek baar to unako ye paigaam sunaao jaa kar tum hamen bhuul gae threedots  ai havaa jaanaa zaraa unakii galii se ho kar vo meraa haal jo puuchhe to ye kahanaa ro kar tum hamen bhuul gae threedots  tum to milate hii nahiin ham yaad se mil lete hain tum to sunate hii nahiin ham yaad se kah dete hain tum hamen bhuul gae threedots

Lyrics: tuu ne jahaan banaa kar ehsaan kayaa kiyaa hai bas khelane kaa apane saamaan kar liyaa hai  lekin tere khilone aansuu bahaa rahe hain sun le pukaar unakii tujh ko bulaa rahe hain marane kii aarzuu men kab tab koii jiyaa hai  gar terii ye thii kvaahish ham munh se kuchh na kahate jo naach tuu nachaataa bas naachate hii rahate mittii ke but banaataa ye dil kyon de diyaa hai

Lyrics: ho o aa panaghat pai ek chhabiilii 2 paanii bharan ko aaii 2 hare raamaa aaii paanii bharan ko aaii 2 panaghat pai ek chhabiilii 2  paanv men daale jhaanjhar 2 chalatii bhii chhanachhanaakar 2 halachal sii ek machaatii 2 sanasaar ko nachaatii 2  paanii bharan ko aaii panaghat pai ek chhabiilii 2  chhotaa saa jii lagaaye 2 bojhal gagar uthaaye 2 phuulon kii daal jaise 2 are raamaa phuulon kii daal jaise 2 parabat uthaa ke laaii 2  panaghat pai ek chhabiilii 2 paanii bharan ko aaii 2 panaghat pai

Title: badanaam na ho jaaye muhabbat kaa fasaanaa
Lyrics: badanaam na ho jaaye muhabbat kaa fasaanaa ai dard bhare aansuon aankhon men na aanaa  duniyaan men muhabbat kii yahii riit hai ai dil jal jaanaa magar honthon par fariyaad na laanaa ai dard bhare aansuon threedots  kah de naa kahiin aankh mere dil kii kahaanii ai dil terii dhadakan kahiin sun le na zamaanaa ai dard bhare aansuon threedots  ai jaanemuhabbat yahii bas merii duaa hai ho jaaye tere saath merii jaan bhii ravaa na ai dard bhare aansuon threedots

Lyrics: khu     more baalapan ke saathii chhailaa bhuul jaiyo naa sai      kyon giit birahaa ke gaatii mainaa bhuul jaiyo naa2  khu     kabhii naa jhuule baag hindole kabhii naa baithe chhaanv re2          kabhii naa puuchhii baat jiyaa kii2          kaahe chale par gaanv re2 sai      tuu kyon itanaa ghabaraatii          bichhadii jodii mil jaatii mainaa bhuula jaiyo naa2 khu     more baalapan ke saathii chhailaa bhuul jaiyo naa  sai     dil ke darpan maa hii sajaniyaa luungaa tujhe nihaar re2          jab ghir aaye saavan bhaado2          liijo hamen pukaar re2 khu     more saathii naa ghabaraatii torii mainaa ro ro gaatii          chhailaa bhuul jaiyo naa  sai     bichhadii jodii mil jaatii mainaa bhuul jaiyo naa khu     o chhailaa bhuul jaiyo naa sai     o mainaa bhuul jaiyo naa

Title: aahen na bhariin shikave na kie
Lyrics: aahen na bhariin shikave na kie kuchh bhii na zubaan se kaam liyaa is par bhii muhabbat chhup na sakii jab teraa kisii ne naam liyaa ham dil ko pakad kar baith gae haathon se kalejaa thaam liyaa  puuchhaa jo kisii ne haal to ham kuchh kah na sake kuchh kah bhii gae roke to bahut aansuu lekin kuchh ruk bhii gae kuchh bah bhii gae afasaanaa kahaa aur lab na hile ashkon se zubaan kaa kaam liyaa  roke se bhalaa kyaa dil rukataa duniyaa ko tadapkar tadapaataa sach puuchhiye vo to khair huii mahafil men tamaashaa ban jaataa kuchh aap adaaen rok gae kuchh zabt se hamane kaam liyaa  go laakh tumhaare zulm sahe par aankh se aansuu bah na sakaa biimaaremohabbat ai naqshab kuchh aur to munh se kah na sakaa ik lambiisii thandii saans bharii chupakese kisii kaa naam liyaa

Lyrics: marane kii duaaen kyon maanguun  jiine kii tamannaa kaun kare kaun kare  ye duniyaa ho yaa vo duniyaa ab khvaahisheduniyaa kaun kare kaun kare  marane kii   jo aag lagaaii thii tumane 2 usako to bujhaayaa ashkon ne 2 jo ashkon ne bhadakaaii hai us aag ko thandaa kaun kare kaun kare  marane kii   jab kashtii saabitosaalim thii 2 saahil kii tamannaa kisako thii 2 ab aisii shikastaa kashtii par saahil kii tamannaa kaun kare kaun kare  marane kii

Title: ai chaand ummiidon ko merii shamaa dikhaa de

Lyrics: kal kal kal kal kal kal kal kyaa kal honge raajaa raam 2  raajaa raam raam raam re kal honge raajaa raam  2  raajaa raam haan raam haan kal haan kal kal kal kal kal honge raajaa raam raajaa raam raam raam re kal honge raajaa raam   chunchun phuulon ko laauun shrii raam ko bhent chadhaauun  2 main ek sundar haar banaauun siitaa jii ko pahanaauun ek sundar haar banaauun siitaa jii ko pahanaauun  main bhaunraa ban kar charan kamal kaa bhaunraa main bhaunraa ban kar charan kamal men sadaa karuun aaraam kal honge raajaa raam raajaa raam raam raam re kal honge raajaa raam  main mahaakavi ban jaauun nit kavitaa naii banaauun aa main mahaakavi ban jaauun nit kavitaa naii banaauun main koyal ban kar gaauun 2 moron ko naach nachaauun 2  kitane chal kar jitane ad kar raam ke darashan paauun kar lo darashan baithe dekho kar lo darashan baithe dekh hriday sinhaasan raam  kal honge raajaa raam raajaa raam raam raam re kal honge raajaa raam

Title: ai dil merii aahon men itanaa to asar aae
Lyrics: aa  ai dil merii aahon men 2 itanaa to asar aae jab aankh khule unakii tasviir nazar aae ai dil merii aahon men threedots  bekaar mohabbat hai jab tak ke mohabbat men 3 aramaan na hon puure ummiid na bar jaae jab aankh khule threedots  jis vaqt merii unakii nazaron se milen nazaren 3 koii na idhar dekhe koii na idhar aae jab aankh khule threedots  puuchho to mohabbat kii manzil se guzaranaa hai 3 socho to mohabbat kii manzil se guzar aae jab aankh khule threedots  tuufaan se bachane kii ummiid naa thii lekin 3 aa hii gae saahil par go laakh bhanvar aae jab aankh khule threedots

Title: qaum kii kidamat men raho mitane ko taiyaar
Singer: hemant bela ava banerjee samaresh roy
Lyrics: hebe qaum kii kidamat men raho mitane ko taiyaar sab marane ko taiyaar raho mitane ko taiyaar raho badane ko taiyaar raho marane ko taiyaar  s aapas ke fasadon ko mitaanaa hii padegaa aa ye zulm ki tahadii ko hataanaa hii padegaa sbe vo qaum nahii jisame naa ho badane kaa aramaan sab marane ko taiyaar raho mitane ko taiyaar raho badane ko taiyaar raho marane ko taiyaar  he mandir ne pukaaraa tumhe masajiid ne pukaaraa allaah ne pukaaraa tumhe iishvar ne pukaaraa hebe azaad vatan ke lie validaan ho jaanaa azaad vatan ke lie qurbaan ho jaanaa sab marane ko taiyaar raho mitane ko taiyaar raho badane ko taiyaar raho marane ko taiyaar  he ved men quraan men to ek baat hain inasaan ke kidamat se badaa kaun kaam hain s inasaan ke kidamat me karo bhet zindagii aapas ke fasaadon se karo bhet bandagii sab marane ko taiyaar raho mitane ko taiyaar raho badane ko taiyaar raho marane ko taiyaar

Lyrics: huaa kyaa qusuur jo hamase ho duur jaanjigar aankhon ke nuur  2 huaa kyaa qusuur  jaamemohabbat hamaarii galii men 3 chhalakaate chale chhalakaate chale tum lutaate chale haan chhalakaate chale tum lutaate chale hamaaraa hii dil tarakaate chale bas hamaaraa hii dil tarakaate chale kaisii sazaa hai ye mere huzuur  hamase ho duur jaanjigar aankhon ke nuur huaa kyaa qusuur jo hamase ho duur jaanjigar aankhon ke nuur huaa kyaa qusuur   auron ne pii aur lage jhuumane haan lage jhuumane  2 hamane bhii pii hamane bhii pii par na aayaa suruur 2  aisii pilaavo ki piite rahen ham ki piite rahen ham  2 ki piite rahen ham nashe men ho chuur 2  aankhon ke nuur  huaa kyaa qusuur jo hamase ho duur jaanjigar aankhon ke nuur  2 huaa kyaa qusuur

Lyrics: duur papiihaa bolaa raat aadhii rah gaii merii tumhaarii mulaaqaat baaqii rah gaii duur papiihaa bolaa threedots  meraa dil hai udaas jiyaa mandmand hai baadalon ke ghere men chaand nazarband hai baadal aae par barasaat baaqii rah gaii merii tumhaarii mulaaqaat baaqii rah gaii duur papiihaa bolaa threedots  aankh michaulii khelii jhulaa jhuum ke jhuule ban men chamelii phuulii ham bahaar men bhuule par denii thii jo saugaat baaqii rah gaii merii tumhaarii mulaaqaat baaqii rah gaii duur papiihaa bolaa threedots

Lyrics: tuute hue aramaanon kii ik duniyaa basaaye2 baithii huun terii yaad ko siine se lagaaye2 tuute hue armaan   tuu duur hai nazaron se2 khushii duur hai dil se2 tuu aaye to phir merii khushii laut ke aaye tuute hue aramaanon threedots  is dar se ki duniyaa kahiin majabuur na kar de majabuur na kar de palakon se laharaate hue aansuu na bahaaye tuute hue aramaanon threedots  ik qaid hai gam kii ik qaid hai gam kii ye judaaii kaa zamaanaa judaaii kaa zamaanaa aajaa ke gam  mujhase kahiin jiit na jaaye tuute hue aramaanon threedots

Title: ummiidon kaa taaraa qisamat se
Lyrics: ummiidon kaa taaraa ummiidon kaa taaraa qisamat se kuchh der chamak ke tuut gayaa tuut gayaa gharbaar lutaa barabaad huye sayyaad chaman ko luut gayaa luut gayaa  jab tum hii nahiin to duniyaa men jiine kii kushii bhii koii nahiin koii nahiin ab aag lage yaa barf gire 2 aramaan bharaa dil tuut gayaa tuut gayaa ummiidon kaa taaraa  aaraam uthaaye the jitane gam unase bhii jyaadaa hamako mile naazuk thaa bahot chhaalaa dil kaa 2 ek thes lagii aur phuut gayaa phuut gayaa ummiidon kaa taaraa

Title: gariibon kaa hissaa gariibon ko de do
Lyrics: gariibon kaa hissaa gariibon ko de do gariibon ko  de do  gariibon kaa amiiro amiiro hamen sukhii rotii hii de do gariibon kaa hissaa  jo pahale thii vahii hai ab bhii haalat hamaarii the pahale bhii bhukhe  hain ab bhii bhikhaarii hameshaa se hain haath phaile hue do  gariibon kaa hissaa   ye unchii imaarat ye resham ke tukade  naa kutiyaa hii hamako naa khaadii ke tukade hamen bhii to apanaa badan dhaankane do gariibon kaa hissaa   agar rukhii sukhii ye khaakar bachenge to kal ko ye gaandhii jawaahir banenge inhen sirf  jiine kaa maukaa hii de do gariibon kaa hissaa

Title: gulashan pe hai bahaar koyal kii hai pukaar
Lyrics: gulashan pe hai bahaar koyal kii hai pukaar piyaa aajaa re  biitaa jo bachapan to aaii javaanii usakii kahaanii piyaa tumako sunaanii jiyaa hai beqaraar baaten to hon dochaar piyaa aajaa re gulashan pe hai bahaar threedots  sakhiyon ne daale hain ambavaa pe jhuule aise samay men saiyaan tum hamako bhuule chhedenge man ke taar gaaenge ham malhaar piyaa aajaa re gulashan pe hai bahaar threedots  aankhon men aa ke piyaa dil men samaa jaa ujadii huii tuu merii duniyaa basaa jaa jiivan ke ye din chaar kyuun jaane den bekaar piyaa aajaa re gulashan pe hai bahaar threedots

Title: aa jaa merii barabaad mohabbat ke sahaare
Lyrics: aa jaa aa jaa aa jaa merii barabaad mohabbat ke sahaare hai kaun jo bigadii huii taqadiir sanwaare  2   aaye bhii na the kushq huye aankhon men aansuu haay aankhon men aansuu  2 nikale bhii na the lut gaye aramaan bechaare hai kaun jo bigadii huii taqadiir sanwaare   anjaamemohabbat hamen maaluum hai lekin hamen maaluum hai lekin  2 lete hain tere gam men ummiidon ke sahaare hai kaun jo bigadii huii taqadiir sanwaare   thaa dil ko faqat terii mohabbat kaa sahaaraa mohabbat kaa sahaaraa  2 hamane isii ummiid pe din apane guzaare hai kaun jo bigadii huii taqadiir sanwaare  aa jaa aa jaa aa jaa merii barabaad mohabbat ke sahaare hai kaun jo bigadii huii taqadiir sanwaare

Lyrics: aavaaz de kahaan hai duniyaa meri javaan hai  aabaad mere dil men ummiid kaa jahaan hai  duniyaa meri javaan hai threedots  aa raat jaa rahi hai  yuun jaise chaandanii ki  baaraat jaa rahi hai  chalane ko ab falak se  taaron kaa kaaravaan hai  aise men tu kahaan hai  duniyaa meri javaan hai threedots  kismat pe chhaa rahi hai  kyon raat kii siyaahii  viran hai meri niinden  taaron se le gavaahii  barabaad main yahaan huun  aabaad tu kahaan hai  bedard aasamaan hai threedots  aavaaz de kahaan hai threedots

Title: betaab hai dil dardemuhabbat ke asar se
Lyrics: umabetaab hai dil betaab hai dil dardemuhabbat ke asar se jis din se meraa chaand chhupaa merii nazar se betaab hai dil  umasoii huii qismat ko merii aake jagaa jaa aajaa merii duniya men zaraa laut ke aajaa2 aankhon ko hai ummiid aankhon ko hai ummiidterii raahguzar  se jis din se meraa chaand chhupaa merii nazar se betaab hai dil  surye kaun mere dil merii aankhon men samaaya ye kiskii nigaahon ne mujhe apanaa banaayaa2 begaana huii begaanaa huii jaati huun duniyaa kii kabar se takaraagaii ye kis kii nazar merii nazar se betaab hai dil  umadam bhar ko terii yaad se gaafil nahiin rahatii jo dil pe guzaratii hai zubaan se nahiin kahatii2 fariyaad bhii fariyaad bhii hotii nahiin rusuvaaii ke dar se jis din se meraa chaand chhupaa merii nazar se betaab hai dil  surik mauj hai ik raag hai ik rang hai jii men hanstii huun kushii men gaatii huun kushii men2 utthaa hai ye tuufaan utthaa hai ye tuufaan kudaa jaane kidhar se takaraagaii ye kiskii nazar merii nazar se

Title: prem kii naiyaa ko milaa hai prem nadii kaa kinaaraa

Lyrics: le aai phir kahaan par qismat hamen kahaan se 2 ye to vohii jagah hai guzare the ham jahaan se le aai phir kahaan par   majabuur kar rahii hai phir gardishezamaanaa 2 ham chhed den vahiin se guzaraa huaa fasaanaa lekin koi bataa de bhuule the ham kahaan se ye to vohii jagah hai guzare the ham jahaan se le aai phir kahaan par   terii hii anjuman men ye intezaar teraa 2 tere bagair saathii jashnebahaar teraa ye kaun sii adaa hai puuchhenge aasmaan se ye to vohii jagah hai guzare the ham jahaan se le aai phir kahaan par   mahafil men aapakii ham kuchh aur to na laae 2 nagamaat men sajaakar jazabaat leke aae yaad aaenge bahut ham jaaenge jab yahaan se ye to vohii jagah hai guzare the ham jahaan se   le aai phir kahaan par qismat hamen kahaan se 2 ye to vohii jagah hai guzare the ham jahaan se le aai phir kahaan par

Lyrics: kaantaa laago re sajanavaa mose raah chalii na jaaye uii maan raah chalii na jaaye kaantaa laago re   threedots  saajan kaantaa priit banii hai morii galii men aaye ek chupake se chubhe badan men duujii hansii udaaye raah chalii na jaaye raamaa raah chalii na jaaye daiyyaa raah chalii na jaaye   threedots  kaantaa laago haan haan kaantaa laago re sajanavaa mose raah chalii na jaaye kaliyaan chunane chalii kaanton se ghabaraaye sukh vo kaise paaye baanvarii duhkh se jo dar jaaye aao sajan haath pakad lo sang sang donon jaayen galii galii men kaante hain jo kalii kalii ban jaayen phir mat kahanaa kabhii sajaniyaa raah chalii na jaaye mose raah chalii na jaaye   threedots

Title: kahiin kaa diipak kahiin kii baatii  dekh chaand kii or
Lyrics: kahiin kaa diipak kahiin kii baatii   2 aaj bane hain jiivanasaathii dekh hansaa hai chaand musaafir dekh chaand kii ora  threedots  dekh ghataa ghanaghor  2 musaafir dekh ghataa ghanaghor 2 chaand ke mukh par ghunghat daale khel rahii jo khel  2 chhipaa liyaa aanchal men mukhadaa dekh ghataa kaa khel 2 khel khel men dekh musaafir bandhii priit kii dora dekh chaand kii ora threedots  dekh lahar kii ora 2 musaafir dekh lahar kii ora 2 tadap uthii jo dekh chaand ko chhipaa na paayii priit 2 milana huaa chandaa laharon kaa guunj uthaa sangiit 2 jhuum uthe hain dekh musaafir chandaa aur chakora dekh chaand kii ora threedots

Title: aa jaa aa jaa aa jaa merii barbaad muhabbat ke sahaare
Lyrics: aa jaa aa jaa threedots aa jaa meri barabaad mohabbat ke sahaare  hai kaun jo bigadii huii taqadir sanvaare  hai kaun jo threedots  aaye bhi na the khushk hue aankhon men aansuu  2 nikale bhi na the lut gaye aramaan bechaare  hai kaun jo threedots  anjaamemohabbat hamen maalum hai lekin  2 lete hain tere gam men ummiidon ke sahaare  hai kaun jo threedots  tha dil ko fakat teri mohabbat kaa sahaaraa  2 hamane isi ummiid pe din apane guzaare  hai kaun jo threedots

Lyrics: ai chaand ai chaand na itaraanaa ai chaand na itaraanaa aate hain mere sajan aate hain mere sajan sajan aate hain mere sajan sajan se chhip jaanaa ai chaand na itaraanaa  tuu teraa goraa badan mere gore sajan saajan se na baazii lagaanaa kaun sundar hai bol mere priitam yaa tuu hai hamako yahii aazamaanaa ai chaand na itaraanaa  sun apanii kahaanii merii zabaanii apanii kahaanii merii zabaanii isako na tum bhuul jaanaa jab iishwar ne donon kaa karane wajan 2 do paladon men donon ko daalaa ek palade men tuu duuje men sajan 2 taraazuu ko jyuunhii uthaayaa taraazuu ko jyuunhii uthaayaa jo halkaa thaa wo uth gayaa uupar 2 jo bhaarii thaa wo niiche aayaa haan jo bhaarii thaa wo niiche aayaa wo meraa hai chaand sundar hai chaand wo meraa hai chaand tuu jo sundar hai chaand tuu man hii men na bhuul jaanaa  ai chaand na itaraanaa aate hain mere sajan aate hain mere sajan sajan aate hain mere sajan sajan se chhip jaanaa ai chaand

Title: thukaraake mujhe jaanevaale  o jaanevaale tuu ne
Lyrics: thukaraake mujhe jaanevaale ik thokar aur lagaataa jaa sinduur to maang se chhiin liyaa ab phuulon ko thukaraataa jaa  o jaanevaale jaanevaale tuune aramaanon kii duniyaa luut lii muskuraane bhii na paaii thii tamannaa luut lii haaye duniyaa luut lii  o jaanevaale threedots  chhiin kar khushiyaan merii rone ko aansuu de diye  2 raat din maangii mere dil ne duaa jisake liye 2 kyaa qayaamat hai kyaa qayaamat hai usii ne dil kii duniyaa luut lii muskuraane bhii na paaii thii tamannaa luut lii haaye duniyaa luut lii  o jaanevaale threedots   kar diyaa beghar mujhe mere hii ghar ke saamane 2 aa gayii jab pyaar kii manzil nazar ke saamane      2 luutanevaale ne luutanevaale ne manzil kii tamannaa luut lii muskuraane bhii na paaii thii tamannaa luut lii haaye duniyaa luut lii  o jaanevaale tuune aramaanon kii duniyaa luut lii muskuraane bhii na paaii thii tamannaa luut lii haaye duniyaa luut lii  o jaanevaale threedots

Title: o varshaa ke pahale baadal
Lyrics: o varshaa ke pahale baadal meraa sandesaa le jaanaa o varshaa ke pahale baadal meraa sandesaa le jaanaa ansuvan kii buundan barasaakar 2 alkaa nagarii men tum jaakar khabar merii pahunchaanaa o varshaa ke pahale baadal meraa sandesaa le jaanaa  maalabhuumi aur amrakuut se vindhyaachal narmadaa ko jaanaa vidishaa nagarii aur betawaa tak hokar aage paanv badhaanaa aag virah kii jahaan bhii paanaa 2 barasbaras kar use bujhaanaa o varshaa ke pahale baadal meraa sandesaa le jaanaa  dekh andheraa dekh andheraa piyaamilan ko chalegii chhup kar koii gorii path men tum bijalii chamakaakar khol na denaa khol na denaa khol na denaa usakii chorii birahan ko tum jahaan bhii paanaa use kabhii na sataanaa o varshaa ke pahale baadal meraa sandesaa le jaanaa  ujjainii men mahaakaal kaa mandir jab tum paao pujaarinon kaa naach dekhakar pujaarinon kaa naach dekhakar apanaa man bahalaao par tum unake angdhang ko dekh atak na jaao 2  shipraa men naa chambal men naa kuruxetra men rukanaa kankhal men na gangaa kii laharon ko chuumane jhukanaa atal himaalay pe chadhake phir yuun mudanaa kailaash kii or jyuun chandaa ko dekh ke pyaare gagan ko chuume jaaye chakor alkaa men phir dhuundh use tum meraa sandes sunaanaa o varshaa ke pahale baadal meraa sandesaa le jaanaa

Title: aaj kii raat saazedilepuradard na chhed
Lyrics: aaj kii raat saazedilepuradard na chhed aaj kii raatthreedots  qaul ulafat kaa jo hanste hue taron ne sunaa band kaliyon ne sunaa mast bahaaron ne sunaa sab se chhup kar jise do prem ke maaron ne sunaa kwaab kii baat samajh usako haqiiqat na banaa aaj kii raatthreedots  ab hain aramaanon pe chhaae hue baadil kaale phuut kar risane lage hain mere dil ke chhaale aankh bhar aaii chhalakane ko hain ab ye pyaale muskaraaenge mere haal pe duniyaavaale aaj kii raatthreedots  bebason par ye sitim kuub zamaane ne kiyaa khel khelaa thaa muhabbat kaa udhuuraa hii rahaa haae taqadiir ke taqadiir se puuraa na huaa aise aanii thii judaaii mujhe maaluum na thaa  aaj kii raatthreedots

Lyrics: suraiyyaa oa paradesii musaafir 2 kise karataa hai ishaare 2 itanaa to bataa de 2 teraa dil kis ko pukaare kis ko pukaare oa paradesii musaafir  lataa luutaa hai mujhe tuune hii mehamaan banaa ke mujhe mehamaan banaa ke 2 oa puuchhanewaale 2 meraa dil tujhako pukaare tujhako pukaare  su oa paradesii musaafir 2  aa gaaen fizaaon men muhabbat ke taraane muhabbat ke taraane 2 aa kar na chale jaaen saawan ke nazaare saawan ke nazaare  oa paradesii musaafir 2  la darataa huun muhabbat merii ho jaae na badanaam ho jaae na badanaam 2 oa dekhe naa zamaanaa 2 kahiin aankhon ke ishaare aankhon ke ishaare  su oa paradesii musaafir kise karataa hai ishaare itanaa to bataa de teraa dil kis ko pukaare kis ko pukaare oa paradesii musaafir

Title: kyaa mil gayaa bhagavaan tumhe dil ko dukhaake
Lyrics: kyaa mil gayaa bhagavaan tumhen dil ko dukhaake  aramanon ki nagari men meri aag lagaake  kya mil gayaa threedots  ham soch rahe the kabhi dil dil se milenge  jivan men mohabbat ke kabhi phuul khilenge  ye kyaa thi khabar tum ko na aaegii daya bhi  rakh doge kisii din meri duniyaa ko mitaake  aramanon kii nagarii threedots  aakaash hii dushman nahiin dushman hai zamiin bhi  dukh ke maare to nahiin chain kahiin bhi  is jiine se ab maut hii aajaaye to achchhaa  jab chhut gayaa haath unakaa mere hathon men aake  aramanon kii nagarii threedots  maaluum na tha khaaq men mil jaayenge ek dil  khud apanii hii ham aag men jal jaaenge ek dil  tumase to ye ummiid na thi jal ke khevayyaa  naiyyaa ko dubo doge kinaare pe laake  aramanon kii nagarii threedots

Lyrics: kab tak niraas kii andhiyaarii kab tak niraas kii aas kii daamin damakaa degii yahii badariyaa kaarii kab tak niraas kii  suukhe ped kii daardaar hai ras kii bharii pichakaarii jaise laaj kaa ghuunghat kaadhe koii sundar naarii  aas kii daamin damakaa degii yahii badariyaa kaarii kab tak niraas kii  kajarii rain hii hot samajho kaare nayan kii jyotii 2 juganuu juganuu ban ke chamak rahii hai chhupii huii ujiyaarii  aas kii daamin damakaa degii yahii badariyaa kaarii kab tak niraas kii  huaa bhii aisaa hii niraashaa kii kaalii badariyaa umadghumad ke barasii to lekin usii men aashaa kii kiran phuut padii aur  bhaii jagat ujiyaarii 2 jhalak thii jisakii andhiyaarii men yahii thii wo ujiyaarii dekho bhaii jagat ujiyaarii  ban gaii kaajal jaagii aankh kaa simat ke rain andhiyaarii bhaii jagat ujiyaarii   nainanjal se siinchaa thaa jisako harii huii wo kyaarii  2 bigadii banaane waale tuune rakh lii laaj hamaarii  bhaii jagat ujiyaarii  ban gaii kaajal jaagii aankh kaa simat ke rain andhiyaarii bhaii jagat ujiyaarii
